Description: [action]: Fight. You get +2 [combat] and deal +1 damage for this attack. When you initiate this ability, you may release a [bless] token sealed on Holy Spear. [action] Search the chaos bag for 2 [bless] tokens and seal them on Holy Spear: Fight. You get +4 [combat] and deal +2 damage for this attack.
Name: Holy Spear

Description:
Permanent. Exceptional.
Your deck must include at least 10 skills. Your deck size is increased by 5.
[reaction] Before drawing your opening hand: Attach 5 random non-weakness skills from your deck facedown to this card.
[fast] Exhaust Ancestral Knowledge: Draw 1 attached skill.
Name: Ancestral Knowledge

Description:
Uses (0 secrets).
Secrets on Ariadne's Twine can be spent as if they were on any asset controlled by an investigator at your location.
[free] Exhaust Ariadne's Twine: Move 1 secret from an asset you control to your resource pool, as a resource, or vice versa.
Name: Ariadne's Twine

Description: Fast. Uses (4 ammo). [action] Spend 1 ammo: Fight. If the attacked enemy is exhausted, you get +2 [combat] and deal +1 damage for this attack. [reaction] After you evade an enemy at your location: Perform the above Fight ability without spending an action.
Name: .25 Automatic

Description:
You may commit Justify the Means to any type of test.
As an additional cost to commit Justify the Means to a skill test, add [curse] tokens to the chaos bag equal to this test's difficulty.
This test automatically succeeds.
Name: Justify the Means

Description:
Exceptional.
[reaction] When you reveal a non-[curse], non-[auto_fail] chaos token, add 1 [curse] token to the chaos bag: Ignore the just revealed chaos token and reveal another one to resolve. If that token has a [curse] or [auto_fail] symbol, return Lucky Dice to your hand (cannot be ignored/canceled).
Name: Lucky Dice

Description:
Either (choose one):
- Add X [curse] tokens to the chaos bag to add X [bless] tokens to the chaos bag.
- Remove X [curse] and X [bless] tokens from the chaos bag to heal X total horror from among cards at your location.
Name: Rite of Equilibrium

Description:
Jacob Morrison does not ready during the upkeep phase.
[reaction] When you would fail a skill test, exhaust Jacob Morrison: You get +2 skill value for that test.
[reaction] After a [bless] token is revealed from the chaos bag during a skill test you are performing: Ready Jacob Morrison.
Name: Jacob Morrison

Description: Attach to your location. Uses (3 offerings). Attached location gains: "[fast] Draw the top card of the encounter deck, exhaust Shrine of the Moirai, and spend 1 offering: Return up to 2 cards with a total combined level of 5 or less from your discard pile to your hand. Any investigator at this location may trigger this ability." Card design by the Moirai at Arkham Nights 2019.
Name: Shrine of the Moirai

Description:
[reaction] After an enemy attacks you (except an attack of opportunity you provoked), even if that attack was canceled: Either deal 1 damage to that enemy, or automatically evade it.
[elder_sign] effect: +1. If you were attacked by an enemy this round, you automatically succeed, instead.
Name: Daniela Reyes

Description: Daniela Reyes deck only. [fast] Exhaust Mechanic's Wrench: Choose an enemy at your location. That enemy attacks you. [action]: Fight. Use this ability only against an enemy that has attacked you since the end of your last turn. You get +2 [combat] for this attack and deal +1 damage for this attack.
Name: Mechanic's Wrench

Description: Hunter. Prey - Daniela Reyes only. This enemy's attacks cannot be canceled. Damage/horror dealt by this enemy's attacks is treated as direct.
Name: Mob Goons

Description: Play with the top card of your deck revealed. Once per round, you may play the top card of your deck as if it were in your hand, at -1 resource cost. Forced - After a weakness is revealed while on top of your deck: Draw it. [elder_sign] effect: +X. You may swap the top card of your deck with a card in your hand. X is the resource cost of the top card of your deck.
Name: Norman Withers

Description:
Norman Withers deck only.
[fast] Exhaust Livre d'Eibon: Swap the top card of your deck with a card in your hand.
[fast] Exhaust Livre d'Eibon: Commit the top card of your deck to an eligible skill test performed by an investigator at your location.
Name: Livre d'Eibon

Description: Revelation - Place this card on top of your deck. While The Harbinger is revealed and on top of your deck, cards in your deck cannot be searched, drawn, or manipulated in any way except by the below ability. [action] [action]: Discard The Harbinger. This ability may be activated while The Harbinger is on top of your deck, as if it were in your threat area.
Name: The Harbinger

Description:
[reaction] At the end of your turn, if you started this round 1 location away from your current location: Either gain 1 resource or draw 1 card (if you started this round 2 or more locations away, do both instead).
[elder_sign] effect: +1. If you started this round 1 or more locations away from your current location, gain 1 resource or draw 1 card.
Name: Monterey Jack

Description: Fast. Monterey Jack deck only. [action]: Fight. This attack uses [agility] instead of [combat]. If this attack succeeds, you may exhaust Trusty Bullwhip to either automatically evade the attacked enemy or deal +1 damage for this attack.
Name: Trusty Bullwhip

Description: Revelation - Put Buried Secrets into play in your threat area. If your location can be investigated, you cannot move except by scenario card effects. [action]: Investigate. If you succeed, instead of discovering clues, discard Buried Secrets. If you fail, you may take 2 horror to shuffle it into your deck.
Name: Buried Secrets

Description:
You begin the game with each Discipline in your deck in play, [[Unbroken]] side faceup.
[elder_sign] effect: +2. After this test ends, flip a [[Broken]] Discipline you control to its [[Unbroken]] side.
Name: Lily Chen

Description:
Lily Chen deck only. Permanent.
You get +1 [willpower].
[action]: Take 1 direct damage to heal 3 horror, or take 1 direct horror to heal 3 damage. Flip this asset over.
Name: Discipline

Description:
Lily Chen deck only. Permanent.
[reaction] After the round ends, if you took no damage or horror this round: Flip this asset over to its [[Unbroken]] side.
Name: Discipline

Description:
Lily Chen deck only. Permanent.
You get +1 [intellect].
[action]: If you have fewer than 5 cards in your hand: Draw cards until there are 5 cards in your hand. Flip this asset over.
Name: Discipline

Description:
Lily Chen deck only. Permanent.
[reaction] After the round ends, if your hand did not have 2 or more cards in it at any point this round: Flip this asset over to its [[Unbroken]] side.
Name: Discipline

Description:
Lily Chen deck only. Permanent.
You get +1 [combat].
[action]: You get +5 skill value for the next skill test you perform this turn. After that skill test ends, flip this asset over. This action does not provoke attacks of opportunity.
Name: Discipline

Description:
Lily Chen deck only. Permanent.
[reaction] After the round ends, if you performed no skill tests this round: Flip this asset over to its [[Unbroken]] side.
Name: Discipline

Description:
Lily Chen deck only. Permanent.
You get +1 [agility].
[action]: One at a time, take up to 3 different fight or evade actions. Flip this asset over. This action does not provoke attacks of opportunity.
Name: Discipline

Description:
Lily Chen deck only. Permanent.
[reaction] After the round ends, if no enemies were at the same location as you at any point this round: Flip this asset over to its [[Unbroken]] side.
Name: Discipline

Description: Revelation - You must either (choose one): - Flip a Discipline you control to its [[Broken]] side. It cannot be flipped back this round. - Take 1 damage and 1 horror.
Name: Burden of Destiny

Description:
At any time, an investigator at your location may reveal to you the [[Item]] assets in their hand.
You may take an additional action during your turn, which can only be used to play an [[Item]] asset from the hand of an investigator at your location, under their control. (Both investigators may spend resources to pay its cost).
[elder_sign] effect: +1 for each [[Item]] asset you control.
Name: Bob Jenkins

Description:
Bob Jenkins deck only.
Reduce the cost of each [[Item]] asset you play by 1.
[reaction]: When you play an [[Item]] asset: Play it under the control of any investigator at your location.
Name: Shrewd Dealings

Description: Revelation - Take 1 horror. If you have... - ...10 or fewer resources, take 1 additional horror. - ...5 or fewer resources, take 1 additional horror. - ...0 resources, take 1 additional horror.
Name: Greed

Description: Permanent. Limit 1 per deck. Purchase at deck creation. Forced - When your first turn of the game begins: One at a time, play any number of [[Item]] assets from your hand, reducing the cost of each by 1. During this turn, you have 3 fewer actions to take.
Name: Geared Up

Description: Fight. This attack deals +1 damage and is automatically successful. As an additional cost to perform this attack, the chosen enemy makes an attack against you.
Name: Toe to Toe

Description:
Fast. Play during any [fast] window.
Until the end of the phase, whenever an enemy would attack another investigator at your location, it attacks you instead, then engages you. Cancel 1 horror dealt by each attack made in this way.
Name: "Get behind me!"

Description: Fight. For each different class among cards you control, you get +1 [combat] and deal +1 damage for this attack.
Name: Gang Up

Description: Fight. Add your [agility] to your skill value for this attack. This attack deals +1 damage. If you succeed, automatically evade the attacked enemy.
Name: Sweeping Kick

Description: While Defensive Stance is in your hand or committed to a skill test, it gains [combat] icons equal to your [agility], and [agility] icons equal to your [combat].
Name: Defensive Stance

Description: [action]: Fight. You get +1 [combat] for this attack. After this attack, you may exhaust Butterfly Swords to fight again, adding your [agility] to your skill value for that attack. That attack deals +1 damage.
Name: Butterfly Swords

Description:
Fast. Play when an enemy attacks an investigator at your location.
Cancel that attack. Then, test [agility] (1). If you succeed, deal 1 damage to that enemy.
Name: Dodge

Description:
Fast. Limit 1 [[Composure]] in play.
You get +1 [combat] and +1 [agility].
Non-direct damage/horror must be assigned to Combat Training before it can be assigned to your investigator card.
[fast] Spend 1 resource: You get +1 [combat] or +1 [agility] for this skill test.
Name: Combat Training

Description: Fast. Play when you would draw an encounter card during the mythos phase. Instead, search the encounter deck for an enemy, spawn it engaged with you (instead of its normal spawn location), attach On the Hunt to it, and shuffle the encounter deck. [reaction] When you defeat attached enemy: Gain 3 resources.
Name: On the Hunt

Description: Fight. Choose an enemy at any revealed location as the target for this attack. Before resolving this attack, you may move to that enemy's location. Add your [agility] to your [combat] for this attack. This attack deals +3 damage.
Name: Fang of Tyr'thrha

Description: [action]: Fight. You get +2 [combat] for this attack. After this attack, you may fight again, adding your [agility] to your skill value for that attack. If both attacks are successful, you may exhaust Butterfly Swords to have the second attack deal +1 damage.
Name: Butterfly Swords

Description:
Permanent. Limit 1 per deck. Purchase at deck creation.
Increase your deck size by 15.
During each upkeep phase, instead of drawing 1 card, draw 2 cards and discard 1 of them.
Name: Forced Learning

Description:
You get +1 [intellect].
[reaction] After Jeremiah Kirby enters play, choose "even" or "odd:" Reveal the top 5 cards of your deck. Draw each card with a cost that matches the chosen option. Shuffle the remaining cards into your deck.
Name: Jeremiah Kirby

Description:
Limit 1 per deck. As an additional cost to play this asset, place 1 resource on 4 different locations, as leylines.
[reaction] After you successfully investigate a location with a leyline, exhaust this asset: Move that leyline onto this asset. Then, if there are 4 leylines on it, discard it, take its leylines as resources, and record in your Campaign Log that "you have identified the gateway."
Name: Archive of Conduits

Description:
Fast. Play only during your turn.
Discard the top card of your deck. If that card is a weakness, shuffle it back into your deck. Otherwise, for the remainder of your turn, while that card is in your discard pile, commit it to each eligible skill test you perform.
Name: Written in the Stars

Description:
Limit 1 [[Footwear]] per investigator.
You get +1 [agility].
[reaction] After the last clue is discovered from your location, exhaust Hiking Boots: Move to a connecting location with at least 1 clue, or to a connecting unrevealed location.
Name: Hiking Boots

Description:
Fast. Play only during your turn. Reduce the cost of this card by 1 for each different class among cards you control.
Move to any revealed location.
Name: Join the Caravan

Description: While Survey the Area is in your hand or committed to a skill test, it gains [intellect] icons equal to your [agility], and [agility] icons equal to your [intellect].
Name: Survey the Area

Description: [action]: Choose an investigator at your location and test [intellect] (2). If you succeed, heal 1 damage from that investigator (2 damage instead if you succeed by 2 or more). If you fail, you must either exhaust Medical Texts or deal 1 damage to that investigator.
Name: Medical Texts

Description: Investigate. Choose up to 2 [seeker] assets in your hand. The difficulty of this skill test is equal to the combined cost of the chosen assets. If you succeed, put the chosen assets into play, one at a time. For each [[Relic]] asset put into play by this ability, draw 1 card.
Name: Unearth the Ancients

Description:
Fast. Limit 1 [[Composure]] in play.
You get +1 [intellect] and +1 [combat].
Non-direct damage/horror must be assigned to Scientific Theory before it can be assigned to your investigator card.
[fast] Spend 1 resource: You get +1 [intellect] or +1 [combat] for this skill test.
Name: Scientific Theory

Description:
Researched. Uses (4 leylines). Limit 1 per deck.
[fast]: Move 1 leyline from this asset to a non-[[Elite]] enemy.
[action]: Choose an investigator, and an enemy with a leyline at a revealed location. That investigator moves to that location. You may remove the leyline to deal 1 damage to that enemy.
Name: Archive of Conduits

Description:
Researched. Uses (4 leylines). Limit 1 per deck.
[fast]: Move 1 leyline from this asset to a revealed location.
[action]: Choose an investigator and a revealed location with a leyline. That investigator moves to that location. You may remove the leyline to have them take an investigate action.
Name: Archive of Conduits

Description:
Researched. Uses (4 leylines). Limit 1 per deck.
[fast]: Move 1 leyline from this asset to a non-[[Elite]] enemy.
[action]: Choose an investigator engaged with an enemy with a leyline. That investigator disengages from that enemy and moves to a connecting location. You may remove the leyline to automatically evade that enemy. This action does not provoke attacks of opportunity.
Name: Archive of Conduits

Description:
Researched. Uses (4 leylines). Limit 1 per deck.
[fast]: Move 1 leyline from this asset to an investigator.
[action]: Choose an investigator with a leyline. That investigator draws 1 card and heals 1 damage or 1 horror. You may remove the leyline to have them instead draw 2 cards and heal 2 damage or 2 horror.
Name: Archive of Conduits

Description:
While you are not at the locus, you get +1 [intellect], +1 [agility], and you may ignore attacks of opportunity.
[reaction] After Prophesiae Profana enters play: Choose a revealed location. That location is "the locus" until Prophesiae Profana leaves play.
[action]: Move any investigator to the locus.
Name: Prophesiae Profana

Description:
Permanent. Limit 1 per deck. Purchase at deck creation.
Your deck cannot include more than 1 copy of each non-weakness, non-signature card (by title).
Reduce your deck size by 5.
Name: Underworld Support

Description: Move. Move up to 3 times. Enemies do not engage you during this movement.
Name: Scout Ahead

Description:
One at a time, reveal random tokens from the chaos bag until you choose to stop. Treat each [skull], [cultist], [tablet], or [elder_thing] as a 5; the [auto_fail] as a 10; and the [elder_sign] as either a 1 or an 11. If the combined value of those tokens (ignoring +/-) is...
- ...18 or less, gain 4 resources.
- ...19, gain 5 resources.
- ...20, gain 6 resources.
- ...21, gain 9 resources.
Name: 21 or Bust

Description:
Fast. Play when you draw a non-weakness treachery.
Cancel that card's revelation effect and draw the top card of the encounter deck.
[reaction] When you play Counterespionage, increase its cost by 2. Change "the encounter deck" to "your deck".
[reaction] When you play Counterespionage, increase its cost by 2: Change "you" to "any investigator".
Name: Counterespionage

Description:
Fast. Play during any [fast] window.
Gain 1 resource for each different class among cards you control.
Name: Cheat the System

Description: Reveal an [[Item]] asset in your hand. Another investigator at your location may play that asset as if it were in their hand. If they do, draw 1 card and gain resources equal to that asset's printed cost.
Name: Untimely Transaction

Description: Savant gains [wild] icons equal to your lowest skill other than the skill being tested.
Name: Savant

Description: Exceptional. Uses (0 charges). Forced - After your turn begins: Either place 1 charge here, or take all charges here, as resources. Then, if it has exactly... - 1 charge, you get +3 skill value for your next skill test. - 2 charges, you may move up to 2 times. - 3 charges, you may take an additional action this turn.
Name: The Red Clock

Description:
Fast. Play when an investigator at any location initiates a skill test.
Instead of the skill type indicated for this test ([willpower], [intellect], [combat], or [agility]), this is a resource skill test. The performing investigator's base skill value for this test is equal to half the number of resources in your resource pool (rounded down). Draw 1 card.
Name: Money Talks

Description:
Fast. Play at the start of the investigation phase.
One at a time, reveal cards from the top of any investigator deck(s) until exactly 5 cards have been revealed. Set those cards aside, out of play. While set aside, any investigator may play any of those cards as if they were in their hand. At the start of the next investigation phase, shuffle each of those cards still set aside into its owner's deck.
Name: Black Market

Description:
Fast. Limit 1 [[Composure]] in play.
You get +1 [willpower] and +1 [agility].
Non-direct damage/horror must be assigned to Moxie before it can be assigned to your investigator card.
[fast] Spend 1 resource: You get +1 [willpower] or +1 [agility] for this skill test.
Name: Moxie

Description:
Exceptional.
While you have...
- ...10+ resources, you get +1 health and +1 sanity.
- ...15+ resources, you may take one additional action during your turn.
- ...20+ resources, you get +1 to each of your skills.
Name: The Black Fan

Description: Exceptional. Uses (0 charges). Forced - After your turn begins: You may take all charges here, as resources. Place 1 charge here. If it has exactly... - 1 charge, you get +4 skill value for your next skill test. - 2 charges, you may move up to 3 times. - 3 charges, you may take 2 additional actions this turn.
Name: The Red Clock

Description:
Permanent. Limit 1 per deck. Purchase at deck creation.
After each scenario of a campaign, reduce the experience cost of the first 2 cards you upgrade before the next scenario by 1.
Increase the experience cost for you to purchase new cards by 1.
Name: Down the Rabbit Hole

Description: You have 1 additional arcane slot. [action]: Fight. You get +1 [combat] for this attack for each of your arcane slots that is filled. If at least 2 of your arcane slots are filled, this attack deals +1 damage.
Name: Dragon Pole

Description: For each of your arcane slots that is filled, either heal 1 damage or 1 horror.
Name: Meditative Trance

Description:
Uses (1 charge for each class among cards you control, including this one).
[fast] Spend 1 charge and exhaust Close the Circle: Take a basic action. For each skill test performed during that action, you may use your [willpower] instead of the skill indicated for that action.
Name: Close the Circle

Description:
Place 2 charges on an asset you control.
[reaction] After you draw Winds of Power during your turn: Play it.
Name: Winds of Power

Description:
Fast. Play when an investigator at your location would draw a card from their deck or from the encounter deck.
Name a card. If the drawn card is the named card, that investigator may either (choose one):
- Cancel that card's effects and discard it.
- Immediately play that card at -2 cost.
Name: Foresight

Description: While Occult Theory is in your hand or committed to a skill test, it gains [willpower] icons equal to your [intellect], and [intellect] icons equal to your [willpower].
Name: Occult Theory

Description: Look at the top 6 cards of an investigator's deck or the encounter deck. You may either return them to the top of that deck in any order, or shuffle them into that deck. If you looked at an investigator's deck, that investigator may draw 1 card.
Name: Parallel Fates

Description:
[fast] Exhaust Astronomical Atlas: Look at the top card of your deck. If it is not a weakness, attach it facedown to Astronomical Atlas (max 5 cards attached).
[fast]: Commit a card attached to Astronomical Atlas to an eligible skill test. If that test succeeds, add that card to your hand instead of discarding it. (Limit once per test.)
Name: Astronomical Atlas

Description:
Uses (4 charges).
[action] Spend 1 charge: Heal 2 damage from among investigators at your location.
Name: Healing Words

Description:
Fast. Limit 1 [[Composure]] in play.
You get +1 skill value during skill tests on [[Spell]] cards.
Non-direct damage/horror must be assigned to Grounded before it can be assigned to your investigator card.
[fast] During a skill test on a [[Spell]] card, spend 1 resource: You get +1 skill value for this test.
Name: Grounded

Description: Uses (1 charge). Replenish this charge at the start of each round. You may resolve abilities on [[Spell]] assets in your hand by revealing them from your hand. Treat True Magick as if it were the revealed asset (to pay its costs, spend charges, perfom its effect, etc).
Name: True Magick

Description: Permanent. Limit 1 per deck. Purchase at deck creation. Forced - When your first turn of the game begins: Discard the top 10 cards of your deck.
Name: Short Supply

Description:
Uses (5 secrets). If Schoffner's Catalogue has no secrets, discard it.
You may spend secrets on Schoffner's Catalogue as resources to pay for [[Item]] assets played by any investigator at your location.
Name: Schoffner's Catalogue

Description:
Uses (3 supplies). If Bandages has no supplies, discard it.
[reaction] After an investigator or [[Ally]] asset at your location takes 1 or more damage, spend 1 supply: Heal 1 damage from that card.
Name: Bandages

Description:
Uses (3 durability).
Attach to an [[Item]] asset controlled by an investigator at your location.
[fast] During a skill test on attached asset, spend 1 durability: You get +2 skill value for this test.
Name: Jury-Rig

Description:
Uses (1 charge).
[fast] Spend 1 charge: You get +2 skill value for this test. (Limit once per test.)
[reaction] After an enemy attacks you: Place 1 charge on Bangle of Jinxes.
Name: Bangle of Jinxes

Description: Exile a level 0-5 card in your hand. Discover 2 clues at your location. If the exiled card was level 2 or higher, remove 1 doom from the current agenda. Exile Burn After Reading. Card designed by the Council-in-Exile at Gen Con 2020
Name: Burn After Reading

Description: Strength in Numbers gains a [wild] icon for each different class among cards you control.
Name: Strength in Numbers

Description: While Dauntless Spirit is in your hand or committed to a skill test, it gains [willpower] icons equal to your [combat], and [combat] icons equal to your [willpower].
Name: Dauntless Spirit

Description:
Fast. Play after an enemy attacks you. Max 1 per attack.
Damage/horror from this attack cannot be assigned to [[Ally]] assets. For each point of damage and/or horror you took from this attack, draw 1 card.
Name: Blood Will Have Blood

Description: [action]: Fight. You get +1 [combat] and deal +1 damage for this attack. [action] Discard Fire Extinguisher: Evade. Automatically evade all enemies engaged with you. You may exile Fire Extinguisher instead of discarding it to discard each non-[[Elite]] enemy evaded by this effect.
Name: Fire Extinguisher

Description:
Fast. Limit 1 [[Composure]] in play.
You get +1 [willpower] and +1 [intellect].
Non-direct damage/horror must be assigned to Plucky before it can be assigned to your investigator card.
[fast] Spend 1 resource: You get +1 [willpower] or +1 [intellect] for this skill test.
Name: Plucky

Description:
Fast. Play when a non-[[Elite]] enemy spawns at your location.
That enemy attacks you. Then, automatically evade that enemy and attach Fend Off to it.
Attached enemy cannot ready.
Name: Fend Off

Description: [reaction] After Medical Student enters play: Heal 1 damage and 1 horror from an investigator or [[Ally]] asset at your location.
Name: Medical Student

Description: Choose an enemy at any location other than yours. Either move twice toward that enemy, or discover 1 clue at any empty location between you and the chosen enemy, along the shortest path to reach that enemy.
Name: On the Trail

Description: Choose an enemy at any location other than yours. Move twice toward that enemy. Discover 1 clue at each location you entered by this effect.
Name: On the Trail

Description: You get +1 [intellect] and +1 [combat]. [reaction] After you successfully investigate: Place 1 resource (from the token pool) on Michael Leigh, as evidence (to a maximum of 3 evidence). [reaction] When you initiate an attack, exhaust Michael Leigh and spend 1 evidence: You deal +1 damage for this attack.
Name: Michael Leigh

Description: During the next fight action you perform this turn using a [[Ranged]] or [[Firearm]] asset, treat each [skull], [cultist], [tablet], [elder_thing], or [auto_fail] token you reveal as a "0" token. This action does not provoke attacks of opportunity.
Name: Snipe

Description: Uses (0 ammo). While playing an event, treat Old Shotgun's uses value as 2. [action] Spend 1 ammo: Fight. You get +3 [combat] for this attack. Instead of its standard damage, this attack's damage is equal to the amount you succeed by, or fail by if you fail and would damage another investigator (to a minimum of 1, to a maximum of 3).
Name: Old Shotgun

Description:
[fast]: Choose a [[Firearm]] asset taking up only 1 hand slot in your play area. Attach it to Quickdraw Holster, or switch it with the attached asset. The attached asset takes up no hand slots. (Limit 1 attached asset.)
[fast] Exhaust Quickdraw Holster: Perform a fight action on the attached asset without paying its [action] cost.
Name: Quickdraw Holster

Description: Uses (6 charges). [action]: Fight. For this attack, you may use [willpower] instead of [combat], and you get +1 skill value. If you succeed, spend 1 or 2 charges. Instead of its standard damage, this attack deals 1 damage for each charge spent. If you succeed by 0, lose 1 action.
Name: Brand of Cthugha

Description: [reaction] After Nkosi Mabati enters play: Name a non-[elder_sign] chaos token with a symbol. Until this card leaves play, the named symbol is your "sigil." [reaction] When an investigator at your location reveals a [cultist], [tablet], or [elder_thing] symbol, exhaust Nkosi Mabati: Search the chaos bag for your sigil and reveal it, instead (returning the other token to the chaos bag).
Name: Nkosi Mabati

Description: Uses (9 charges). [action]: Fight. For this attack, you may use [willpower] instead of [combat], and you get +2 skill value. If you succeed, spend 1, 2, or 3 charges. Instead of its standard damage, this attack deals 1 damage for each charge spent. If you succeed by 0, lose 2 actions.
Name: Brand of Cthugha

Description: [action]: Fight. Add your [willpower] to your skill value for this attack. You deal +1 damage for this attack. If you succeed and the enemy is non-[[Elite]], you may move it one location away from you. (If you succeed by 3 or more, you instead deal +2 damage and may move the enemy up to two locations away from you.)
Name: Cyclopean Hammer

Description: [action]: Fight. You get -1 [combat] and deal +1 damage for this attack. [action] [action]: Fight. You get +2 [combat] and deal +2 damage for this attack.
Name: Sledgehammer

Description: [reaction] When you draw a [[Hazard]] treachery, deal 1 damage and 1 horror to Protective Gear: Cancel that card's revelation effect.
Name: Protective Gear

Description: [action]: Fight. You get +1 [combat] and deal +1 damage for this attack. [action] [action] [action]: Fight. You get +5 [combat] and deal +5 damage for this attack.
Name: Sledgehammer

Description: [fast] Exhaust Pocket Telescope: Look at the revealed side of a connecting unrevealed location. [action]: Investigate. Investigate a revealed connecting location as if you were there.
Name: Pocket Telescope

Description:
Uses (3 secrets).
[fast] During your turn, exhaust Eon Chart and spend 1 secret: Choose and take one of the following actions (move, evade, or investigate).
Name: Eon Chart

Description:
You get +1 [intellect] and +1 [agility].
[reaction] During your turn, after you move to a location, exhaust Gen Beauregard: Move a clue or a non-[[Elite]] enemy from a connecting location to your location, or vice versa.
Name: Gen Beauregard

Description:
Uses (3 secrets).
[fast] During your turn, exhaust Eon Chart and spend 1 secret: Choose and take two of the following actions, in any order (move, evade, or investigate).
Name: Eon Chart

Description: Uses (4 charges). [action]: Investigate. For this investigation, you may use [willpower] instead of [intellect], and you get +1 skill value. If you succeed, spend 1 or 2 charges. Instead of discovering a clue at your location, discover 1 clue at your location for each charge spent. If you succeed by 0, choose and discard a card from your hand.
Name: Divination

Description:
Fast. Play after an [[Ally]] asset at your location is discarded by a card effect or is defeated.
Either return that asset to its owner's hand, or its owner draws 3 cards.
Name: Protecting the Anirniq

Description: Uses (6 charges). [action]: Investigate. For this investigation, you may use [willpower] instead of [intellect], and you get +2 skill value. If you succeed, spend 1, 2, or 3 charges. Instead of discovering a clue at your location, discover 1 clue at your location for each charge spent. If you succeed by 0, choose and discard 2 cards from your hand.
Name: Divination

Description:
Uses (3 secrets).
[reaction] When you successfully investigate, exhaust Professor William Webb and spend 1 secret: Instead of discovering a clue at your location, either choose an [[Item]] card in your discard pile and add it to your hand, or discover a clue at a connecting location.
Name: Professor William Webb

Description:
Fast.
[fast] During a skill test while fighting or investigating, exhaust Ice Pick: You get +1 skill value for this test.
Name: Ice Pick

Description:
Uses (3 secrets).
[reaction] When you successfully investigate, exhaust Professor William Webb and spend 1 secret: Choose an [[Item]] card in your discard pile and add it to your hand. Instead of discovering a clue at your location, you may discover a clue at a connecting location.
Name: Professor William Webb

Description: Fast. [fast] During a skill test while fighting or investigating, exhaust Ice Pick: You get +1 skill value for this test. If you succeed, you may discard Ice Pick to have this attack deal +1 damage (if you are fighting), or to discover 1 additional clue at your location (if you are investigating).
Name: Ice Pick

Description: Choose a non-[[Elite]] enemy at a revealed location up to 2 connections away. Swap places with that enemy.
Name: Ethereal Slip

Description: Uses (3 charges). [action] If Blur has charges remaining: Evade. For this evasion attempt, you may use [willpower] instead of [agility], and you get +1 skill value. If you succeed, spend 1 charge and you may take an additional action this turn. If you succeed by 0, take 1 damage.
Name: Blur

Description: Choose a non-[[Elite]] enemy at any revealed location. Swap places with that enemy.
Name: Ethereal Slip

Description: Uses (4 charges). [action] If Blur has charges remaining: Evade. For this evasion attempt, you may use [willpower] instead of [agility] and get +2 skill value. If you succeed, spend 1 or 2 charges and you may take that many additional actions this turn. If you succeed by 0, take 2 damage.
Name: Blur

Description:
Fast. Play after you reveal a chaos token during a skill test.
Reveal an additional chaos token, switching its "-" to a "+". If that chaos token is a [skull] token, you automatically fail.
Name: "Hit me!"

Description: Limit 1 per investigator. Cannot leave play. [reaction] After you play Unscrupulous Loan: Gain 10 resources. Forced - When the game ends or you are eliminated, if you have fewer than 10 resources in your resource pool: Exile Unscrupulous Loan.
Name: Unscrupulous Loan

Description: Limit 1 Precious Memento (From a Former Life) per deck. [reaction] After you fail a skill test by 2 or more, exhaust Precious Memento: Heal 1 damage from it. [reaction] After you succeed at a skill test by 2 or more, exhaust Precious Memento: Heal 1 horror from it.
Name: Precious Memento

Description: Limit 1 Precious Memento (From a Future Life) per deck. [reaction] After you fail a skill test by 2 or more, exhaust Precious Memento: Heal 1 horror from it. [reaction] After you succeed at a skill test by 2 or more, exhaust Precious Memento: Heal 1 damage from it.
Name: Precious Memento

Description:
Fast. Play only during your turn.
Play Talisman of Protection under the control of any investigator at your location.
[reaction] When you assign damage and/or horror that would defeat you, discard Talisman of Protection: Cancel up to 2 of that damage and/or horror.
Name: Talisman of Protection

Description:
Uses (4 charges).
[action]: Test [willpower] (1). For each point you succeed by, you may spend 1 charge to heal 1 damage or 1 horror from an investigator at your location. If you succeed by 0, lose 1 resource.
Name: Earthly Serenity

Description: Uses (3 charges). [action] Exhaust Enchanted Bow: Fight. You must use either [willpower] or [agility] instead of [combat] and get +1 skill value for this attack. This attack deals +1 damage. As an additional cost to initiate this ability, you may spend 1 charge to have this attack target a non-[[Elite]] enemy at a connecting location; if you do, ignore the aloof and retaliate keywords for this attack.
Name: Enchanted Bow

Description:
Uses (6 charges).
[action]: Test [willpower] (0). For each point you succeed by, you may spend 1 charge to heal 1 damage or 1 horror from an investigator at your location. If you succeed by 0, lose 2 resources.
Name: Earthly Serenity

Description:
Uses (2 resources). Replenish these resources at the start of each round.
Resources on Prophetic may be spent to pay for [[Fortune]], [[Spell]], or [[Spirit]] cards.
[fast] During a skill test on a [[Fortune]], [[Spell]], or [[Spirit]] card, spend 1 resource from Prophetic: You get +1 skill value for this test.
Name: Prophetic

Description:
Uses (2 resources). Replenish these resources at the start of each round.
Resources on Sleuth may be spent to pay for [[Charm]], [[Tactic]], or [[Tome]] cards.
[fast] During a skill test on a [[Charm]], [[Tactic]], or [[Tome]] card, spend 1 resource from Sleuth: You get +1 skill value for this test.
Name: Sleuth

Description:
Uses (2 resources). Replenish these resources at the start of each round.
Resources on Bruiser may be spent to pay for [[Armor]], [[Firearm]], or [[Melee]] cards.
[fast] During a skill test on a [[Armor]], [[Firearm]], or [[Melee]] card, spend 1 resource from Bruiser: You get +1 skill value for this test.
Name: Bruiser

Description:
Uses (2 resources). Replenish these resources at the start of each round.
Resources on Crafty may be spent to pay for [[Insight]], [[Tool]], or [[Trick]] cards.
[fast] During a skill test on a [[Insight]], [[Tool]], or [[Trick]] card, spend 1 resource from Crafty: You get +1 skill value for this test.
Name: Crafty

Description:
Uses (2 resources). Replenish these resources at the start of each round.
Resources on Antiquary may be spent to pay for [[Favor]], [[Relic]] or [[Ritual]] cards.
[fast] During a skill test on a [[Favor]], [[Relic]] or [[Ritual]] card, spend 1 resource from Antiquary: You get +1 skill value for this test.
Name: Antiquary

Description:
Permanent. Limit 1 per deck. Purchase at deck creation.
When you purchase In the Thick of It, suffer 2 total physical and/or mental trauma. Then, earn 3 experience.
Name: In the Thick of It

Description: [reaction] After you reveal a non-[auto_fail] symbol on a chaos token during a skill test you are perfoming, deal 1 damage to Heavy Furs: Cancel that chaos token and return it to the bag. Reveal a new chaos token.
Name: Heavy Furs

Description: You may include up to 4 copies of Sled Dog in your deck. Up to 2 Sled Dog cards take up a single ally slot. [action] Exhaust X Sled Dogs: Move. Move X times. [action] Exhaust X Sled Dogs: Fight. You get +X [combat] for this attack. Instead of its standard damage, this attack deals X damage.
Name: Sled Dog

Description:
You have 2 additional ally slots, which can only be used to hold [[Creature]] assets.
[reaction] When you play a [[Creature]] asset during your turn: Reduce that asset's cost by 1.
Name: Rod of Animalism

Description:
One at a time, in any order, if you control a...
- [rogue] card, you may move to a connecting location.
- [guardian] card, deal 1 damage to an enemy at your location.
- [seeker] card, discover 1 clue at your location.
- [mystic] card, heal 1 horror from any card.
- [survivor] card, heal 1 damage from any card.
Name: Call for Backup

Description: Revelation - Put Arm Injury into play in your threat area. Arm Injury can be healed as if it were a single point of damage on you (if it is healed, discard it). Forced - After you take a fight or activate action: You cannot take any of those types of actions for the remainder of the turn.
Name: Arm Injury

Description: Revelation - Put Leg Injury into play in your threat area. Leg Injury can be healed as if it were a single point of damage on you (if it is healed, discard it). Forced - After you take a move, resign, or evade action: You cannot take any of those types of actions for the remainder of the turn.
Name: Leg Injury

Description: Revelation - Put Panic into play in your threat area. Panic can be healed as if it were a single point of horror on you (if it is healed, discard it). Forced - After you take a play, engage, or resource action: You cannot take any of those types of actions for the remainder of the turn.
Name: Panic

Description: Revelation - Put Stupor into play in your threat area. Stupor can be healed as if it were a single point of horror on you (if it is healed, discard it). Forced - After you take a parley, draw, or investigate action: You cannot take any of those types of actions for the remainder of the turn.
Name: Stupor

Description:
Choose one:
- Put the set-aside Base Camp location into play.
- Put the set-aside Deck of the Theodosia location into play.
- Put the set-aside University Halls location into play.
Flip this card back over.
Name: Prison of Memories

Description:
Choose one:
- Follow Takadas memories. Put the set-aside Coastal Waters location into play.
- Follow Eliyahs memories. Put the set-aside Deserted Station location into play.
- Follow Dr. Sinhas memories. Put the set-aside Riverview Theatre location into play.
Flip this card back over.

- Follow Cookies memories. Put the set-aside Coastal Waters location into play.
- Follow Ellsworths memories. Put the set-aside Hedge Maze location into play.
- Follow Claypools memories. Put the set-aside Standing Stones location into play.
Flip this card back over.

Flip this card back over.

Choose one:

Flip this card back over.
Name: Standing Stones

Description: If Takada Hiroko is alive: Spawn the set-aside Memory of a Missing Father enemy at this location. Flip this card back over. If Takada Hiroko is crossed out: Move each investigator and enemy at this location to Prison of Memories. Discard each card attached to this location. Add this card to the victory display. The investigators may advance the current act or continue playing.
Name: Airfield

Description: If Eliyah Ashevak is alive: Spawn the set-aside Memory of a Hunt Gone Awry enemy at this location. Flip this card back over. If Eliyah Ashevak is crossed out: Move each investigator and enemy at this location to Prison of Memories. Discard each card attached to this location. Add this card to the victory display. The investigators may advance the current act or continue playing.

Description: In your Campaign Log, record Eliyah has confronted his demons. Draw a checkmark next to his name in the Expedition Team section. From now on, whenever Eliyah Ashevak is included or used during a scenario, use the set-aside [[Resolute]] version instead of the version from the Expedition Team encounter set. If he is currently in play, switch him with that version now. Add this card to the victory display. The investigators may advance the current act or continue playing.
Name: Memory of a Hunt Gone Awry

Description: In your Campaign Log, record Dr. Sinha has confronted her demons. Draw a checkmark next to her name in the Expedition Team section. From now on, whenever Dr. Mala Sinha is included or used during a scenario, use the set-aside [[Resolute]] version instead of the version from the Expedition Team encounter set. If he is currently in play, switch him with that version now. Add this card to the victory display. The investigators may advance the current act or continue playing.
