From now on, whenever Dr. Amy Kensler is included or used during a scenario, use the set-aside [[Resolute]] version instead of the version from the Expedition Team encounter set. If she is currently in play, switch her with that version now. Add this card to the victory display. The investigators may advance the current act or continue playing.
Name: Memory of an Unrequited Love

Description:
You may take an additional action during your turn, which can only be used on the below [action] ability.
[action]: Choose another investigator at your location. They immediately take an action as if it were their turn. (Limit once per round for each investigator.)
[elder_sign] effect: +0. Draw 1 card. You may resolve this effect anytime another investigator at your location resolves their [elder_sign] effect.
Name: Carson Sinclair

Description:
Carson Sinclair deck only.
Commit only to a skill test being performed by another investigator.
If this test succeeds, the performing investigator draws 1 card. If this test fails, you draw 1 card.
Name: "As you wish"

Description: Revelation - Put Selfless to a Fault into play in your threat area. Forced - At the end of your turn, if you did not commit at least 1 card to a skill test performed by another investigator this turn: Take 1 horror and shuffle Selfless to a Fault into your deck.
Name: Selfless to a Fault

Description:
[reaction] After one of your card effects heals damage from an investigator or an investigator's [[Ally]] asset: Add one of your set-aside On the Mend skills to that investigator's hand.
[elder_sign] effect: +1. You may heal 1 damage from an investigator or [[Ally]] asset at your location.
Name: Vincent Lee

Description: Vincent Lee deck only. [action]: Fight. You get +2 [combat] for this attack. If this attack is successful, you may take 1 damage to deal +1 damage for this attack. [action]: Heal 5 damage from an investigator at your location. Test [intellect] (4). If you fail, that investigator suffers 1 physical trauma. (Max once per game.)
Name: Bonesaw

Description: Limit 1 On the Mend in your hand. Commit only to a test you are performing. Forced - When On the Mend would be discarded from anywhere: Set it aside, out of play, instead.
Name: On the Mend

Description: Revelation - Put Wounded Bystander into play in your play area with 3 damage on it. It cannot leave play while it has damage (unless it is defeated). If it has no damage, discard it. Forced - When you take non-direct damage: At least 1 of it must be assigned to Wounded Bystander, if able. Forced - If Wounded Bystander is defeated: You suffer 1 mental trauma.
Name: Wounded Bystander

Description:
[fast]: Engage an exhausted enemy at your location.
[reaction] When you attempt to evade an exhausted non-[[Elite]] enemy: Add your [intellect] to your skill value for this attempt. If you succeed by at least X, discard that enemy. X is that enemy's remaining health.
[elder_sign] effect: +1. If there is an exhausted enemy at your location, you automatically succeed instead.
Name: Kymani Jones

Description:
Kymani Jones deck only.
Actions performed using Grappling Hook do not provoke attacks of opportunity.
[action][action] Exhaust Grappling Hook: Take up to 3 different basic actions from the following list, in any order (engage, evade, investigate, or move). If you investigate, use your [agility] instead of your [intellect].
Name: Grappling Hook

Description: Alert. Hunter. Prey - Kymani Jones only. While Kymani Jones is evading Agent Fletcher, reduce their [intellect] value to 0.
Name: Agent Fletcher

Description:
[reaction] When you play an asset: Reduce its resource cost by 3. It enters play with 1 doom on it. (Limit once per round.)
[elder_sign] effect: +2. You may move all doom from a card at your location to another card at your location.
Name: Amina Zidane

Description: Amina Zidane deck only. Fast. Play only during your turn. Place 1 doom on an asset you control to resolve an [action] ability on it, ignoring all costs (including its [action] cost). Then, if Word of Weal is in your discard pile, you may shuffle it into your deck.
Name: Word of Woe

Description:
Amina Zidane deck only.
Fast. Play when you perform a skill test on an asset with 1 or more doom on it.
Add your [willpower] to your skill value for this test. Then, if Word of Woe is in your discard pile, you may shuffle it into your deck.
Name: Word of Weal

Description: Revelation - Move 1 doom from an asset you control to the current agenda. This may cause the current agenda to advance. If no doom is moved in this way, shuffle Deafening Silence back into your deck.
Name: Deafening Silence

Description:
You begin the game with Darrell's Kodak in play.
[fast] During a skill test at your location, spend 1 evidence from an asset you control: Reduce the difficulty of this test by 2. (Limit once per test.)
[elder_sign] effect: +1. Place 1 evidence on an asset you control.
Name: Darrell Simmons

Description: Darrell Simmons deck only. [reaction] After an enemy or treachery enters play, exhaust Darrell's Kodak: Place 1 resource (from the token pool) on that enemy or treachery, as evidence. [reaction] After you discover any number of clues: Move that many evidence on enemies or treacheries at that location (or not at any location) to Darrell's Kodak.
Name: Darrell's Kodak

Description: Revelation - Remove 4 evidence from cards you control. For each evidence you cannot remove in this way, take 1 horror.
Name: Ruined Film

Description:
You have 3 additional ally slots.
[fast] During a skill test you are performing, exhaust an [[Ally]] asset you control: For this test, you get +1 skill value, plus an additional +1 for each skill icon that [[Ally]] asset has that matches this test's type.
[elder_sign] effect: +3. Ready an [[Ally]] asset at your location.
Name: Charlie Kane

Description:
Charlie Kane deck only.
[reaction] After you exhaust Bonnie Walsh: Ready another [[Ally]] asset you control. (Limit once per round.)
Name: Bonnie Walsh

Description: Revelation - If you control no [[Ally]] assets, shuffle Burden of Leadership back into your deck. Otherwise, for each [[Ally]] asset you control, either exhaust it or deal it 1 direct damage and 1 direct horror.
Name: Burden of Leadership

Description: Customizable.
Name: Hunter's Armor

Description: Customizable. Uses (4 charges). Replenish 1 of these charges at the start of each round. [action]: Fight. You get +1 [combat] for this attack. Before this attack, you may spend any number of charges to imbue the axe with that many different inscriptions - - Accuracy - You get an additional +2 [combat] for this attack. - Power - This attack deals +1 damage.
Name: Runic Axe

Description:
Customizable.
Attach to a [[Firearm]] asset you control. Limit 1 per asset.
[reaction] When you reveal a non-[auto_fail] chaos token attacking with attached asset, exhaust Custom Modifications: Cancel that chaos token, return it to the chaos bag, and reveal a new one.
Name: Custom Modifications

Description:
Obsidian Bracelet may only be assigned damage and/or horror dealt by treachery effects.
Obsidian Bracelet may be assigned damage and/or horror dealt to other investigators at your location.
Name: Obsidian Bracelet

Description: Evade. Attempt to evade using [combat] instead of [agility]. If you succeed and the enemy is non-[[Elite]], attach Bolas to it. Attached enemy gets -1 evade value. Forced. - After attached enemy moves: Exhaust it.
Name: Bolas

Description:
Test [combat] (1). If you succeed, attach Breach the Door to your location with 1 resource on it for each point you succeeded by, as leads.
Reduce attached location's shroud by 1 for each lead on Breach the Door.
Name: Breach the Door

Description: Fast. Play after you successfully attack a non-[[Elite]] enemy using a [[Melee]] asset. Attach Grievous Wound to the attacked enemy. Forced - At the end of the round: Deal 1 damage to attached enemy.
Name: Grievous Wound

Description: Parley. Choose an investigator at your location. That investigator may play an [[Ally]] asset from their hand, reducing its cost by 3.
Name: Motivational Speech

Description:
Fast. Play at the end of an attack or effect that spends the last ammo from a [[Firearm]] asset you control.
Add 1 ammo to that asset. You get +3 skill value for your next attack with that asset this round.
Name: One in the Chamber

Description:
Commit only to a skill test during an attack or evasion attempt.
You can commit this skill to an investigator's test at any location.
Name: Fighting Lessons

Description:
You may commit Helping Hand to any type of test. Max 1 committed per test.
While Helping Hand is committed to a skill test, double the skill icons of each other card committed to that test.
Name: Helping Hand

Description:
Uses (4 charges).
[fast] During a skill test performed by an investigator at your location or a connecting location, spend 1 charge: Commit a non-weakness card from your hand to that skill test, treating all of its skill icons as [wild]
Name: Bestow Resolve

Description:
You get +1 [intellect].
[fast] Exhaust Field Agent and deal 1 horror to it: Discover 1 clue at your location.
Name: Field Agent

Description: [fast] Exhaust Guard Dog: Engage an enemy at your location. That enemy attacks you. [reaction] When an enemy attack deals damage and/or horror to Guard Dog: Deal 1 damage to the attacking enemy. Card design by the Council-in-Exile at Arkham Nights 2020.
Name: Guard Dog

Description: Fast. [action] If Handcuffs is not attached to an enemy: Evade. Use only on a [[Humanoid]] enemy. This evasion attempt uses [combat] instead of [agility]. If you succeed, remove all doom from the just-evaded enemy and attach Handcuffs to it. If the attached enemy is non-[[Elite]], it cannot ready and doom cannot be placed on it.
Name: Handcuffs

Description: Choose an investigator at your location. That investigator search the top 9 cards of their deck for a [[Weapon]] asset, adds it to their hand or plays it (paying its resource cost), and shuffles their deck.
Name: Prepared for the Worst

Description:
You get +1 skill value while resolving revelation abilities on encounter cards.
[reaction] After another investigator at your location draws a non-peril encounter card, before resolving that card's effects, exhaust Martyr's Vambrace: You are considered to have drawn that encounter card, instead.
Name: Martyr's Vambrace

Description:
Girish Kadakia may be assigned damage and/or horror dealt to other investigators at your location.
[fast] During a skill test being performed by an investigator at your location, exhaust Girish Kadakia: That investigator gets +2 skill value for this test. If this test is successful, heal 1 damage or horror from Girish Kadakia.
Name: Girish Kadakia

Description: One at a time, investigators at your location, as a group, may play up to 4 assets in total from their hands, reducing the resource cost of each by 1.
Name: Ever Vigilant

Description:
Customizable. Uses (3 supplies).
[action] Spend 1 supply: Choose an investigator at your location and test [intellect] (1). If you succeed, that investigator performs one of the following options -
- Draw 2 cards.
- Gain 2 resources.
Name: Alchemical Distillation

Description: Customizable. Limit 1 per investigator. Forced - At the start of the round: Choose one of the following criteria for this round - You fail a test by 2 or more. - You succeed at a test by 3 or more. When the chosen criteria is met, you may exhaust Empirical Hypothesis to add 1 evidence to it. [fast] Spend 1 evidence: Draw 1 card.
Name: Empirical Hypothesis

Description:
Customizable. When you purchase The Raven Quill, name a [[Tome]] or [[Spell]] asset and record that name on its upgrade sheet.
Attach to a named asset you control.
[reaction] When you resign or the game ends: Either mark a checkbox on The Raven Quill's upgrade sheet, or reduce the experience cost to upgrade the attached asset before the next scenario by 1.
Name: The Raven Quill

Description: [reaction] After an enemy at your location is defeated: Place 1 resource (from the token pool) on this card, as evidence. While Dissection Tools has... - ... 1 or more evidence, you get +1 [agility]. - ... 2 or more evidence, you get +1 [combat]. - ... 3 or more evidence, you get +1 sanity.
Name: Dissection Tools

Description: Uses (4 secrets). [action] Spend 1 secret: Investigate. You get +2 [intellect] for this investigation. If you succeed by 2 or more, you may draw 1 card.
Name: Grim Memoir

Description:
[reaction] After a player card ability places 1 or more of your clues on your location: Place that many resources on Research Notes, as evidence.
[action]: Test [intellect] (0). For each point you succeed by, you may spend 1 evidence to discover 1 clue at your location.
Name: Research Notes

Description: Place 1 of your clues on your location. Then, heal 3 damage from an investigator or [[Ally]] asset at your location.
Name: Bizarre Diagnosis

Description: Search the top 6 cards of your deck. You may place up to 3 of your clues on your location. For each clue placed in this way, choose and add 2 of the searched cards to your hand. Shuffle your deck.
Name: Captivating Discovery

Description: Investigate. Add your [willpower] or [agility] to your skill value for this investigation. If you succeed, instead of discovering clues at this location, attach Map the Area to it. Limit 1 per location. Reduce the difficulty of all skill tests at attached location by 1.
Name: Map the Area

Description: After revealing a chaos token for this skill test, you may place 1 of your clues on your location to cancel that chaos token, return it to the chaos bag, and reveal a new one. (You may do this any number of times.)
Name: Analysis

Description: [reaction] When you would fail a skill test on a [seeker] card by 1 or less, exhaust Lab Coat: You succeed by 0, instead.
Name: Lab Coat

Description:
Uses (4 secrets).
[fast] Spend 1 secret: Choose any non-weakness treachery not attached to an [[Elite]] enemy. Until the end of the round, treat that card's printed text box as if it were blank (except for [[Traits]]).
Name: Orphic Theory

Description: Parley. Choose a non-[[Elite]] enemy at your location and test [willpower] or [intellect] (8). This test gets -1 difficulty for each other card in your hand. If you succeed, automatically evade the chosen enemy and attach Existential Riddle to it. Attached enemy gains aloof.
Name: Existential Riddle

Description: Choose another investigator at your location who has yet to take their turn this round. During their turn this round, the chosen investigator gets +1 to each of their skills, and may take an additional action. Playing Guidance does not provoke attacks of opportunity.
Name: Guidance

Description: [reaction] When any investigator draws an encounter card from the encounter deck, exhaust Dr. William T. Maleson and place 1 of your clues on your location: That investigator draws another card from the top of the encounter deck, chooses one of those 2 cards to resolve, and cancels and discards the other.
Name: Dr. William T. Maleson

Description: [reaction] After you spend 1 or more clues or place 1 or more clues on your location, exhaust Press Pass: You may take an additional action during this turn (or your next turn if it is not currently your turn).
Name: Press Pass

Description:
Uses (4 supplies).
[reaction] When one of your card effects heals damage from an investigator, spend 1 supply: Either that effect heals 1 additional damage, or you draw 1 card and heal 1 horror.
[action] [action]: Heal 3 damage from an investigator or [[Ally]] asset at your location.
Name: Surgical Kit

Description: Uses (3 supplies). [action] Exhaust Fingerprint Kit and spend 1 supply: Investigate. You get +2 [intellect] for this investigation. If you succeed, you discover 2 additional clues at your location.
Name: Fingerprint Kit

Description:
[action]: Choose a card at your location and test [intellect] (1). For each point you succeed by, choose one -
- The next time that card would be healed this round, heal +1 damage/horror (to a maximum of +3).
- The next time that card would be dealt damage this round, deal +1 damage (to a maximum of +3).
Name: Gray's Anatomy

Description: Customizable. Uses (3 evidence). [action] Exhaust Damning Testimony and choose an enemy at any location: Investigate (your location). If you succeed, you may spend 1 evidence to discover 1 additional clue at the chosen enemy's location.
Name: Damning Testimony

Description:
Customizable. When you purchase Friends in Low Places, choose and record a [[Trait]] on its upgrade sheet.
Look at the top 6 cards of your deck. For each looked-at card with the chosen [[Trait]](s), you may spend 1 resource to add that card to your hand. Shuffle the remaining cards into your deck.
Name: Friends in Low Places

Description:
Customizable. Fast. Play this card only after one of the following conditions is met:
- The agenda or act advances.
- You succeed at a skill test by 3 or more.
Immediately take an action as if it were your turn (Max once per round).
Name: Honed Instinct

Description: Uses (4 supplies). [action] Spend 1 supply: Evade. You get +2 [agility] for this evasion attempt. If you succeed and the evaded enemy is non-[[Elite]], it does not ready during the next upkeep phase.
Name: Disguise

Description: [fast] Exhaust Embezzled Treasure: Move up to 2 resources from your resource pool to Embezzled Treasure (to a maximum of 10 resources on it). Forced - When you resign or the game ends: For every 2 resources on Embezzled Treasure, an investigator of your choice begins the next scenario of the campaign with 1 additional resource in their resource pool.
Name: Embezzled Treasure

Description: Uses (6 supplies). [action] Spend 1 supply: Investigate. You may use [agility] instead of [intellect] for this investigation. If you succeed, gain 1 resource.
Name: Thieves' Kit

Description:
Fast. Play only during your turn.
Attach to a [[Clothing]] or [[Armor]] asset you control.
Attached asset gains: "You have 1 additional hand or accessory slot (your choice), which can only be used to hold an [[Illicit]] asset."
Name: Hidden Pocket

Description:
Fast. Play only during your turn.
Put an [[Ally]] asset from your hand into play. At the end of your turn, if that asset is still in play, return it to your hand.
Name: Hit and Run

Description:
Fast. Play when you successfully evade a [[Humanoid]] enemy or successfully investigate.
Play an [[Item]] asset from your hand, reducing its cost by X, where X is the amount you succeeded by. Attach "I'll take that!" to that asset. Attached asset gains [[Illicit]].
Name: "I'll take that!"

Description: Search the top 9 cards of the encounter deck for a non-[[Elite]] enemy and spawn it engaged with you (instead of its normal spawn location). Then, discover 1 clue at your location and gain X resources, where X is that enemy's health value. Shuffle the encounter deck.
Name: Kicking the Hornet's Nest

Description: Fast. Play when an enemy attacks you. Evade. Attempt to evade the attacking enemy. If you succeed, cancel that enemy's attack.
Name: Quick Getaway

Description: Max 1 committed per skill test. Commit only to a test you are performing of any type, and only if it is your turn. Calculated Risk gains [wild] for each action you performed this turn (including this one). After this test ends, end your turn.
Name: Calculated Risk

Description: [reaction] When you gain 1 or more resources during your turn via another player card effect, exhaust Stylish Coat: Gain 1 additional resource.
Name: Stylish Coat

Description:
[reaction] When you play a [[Tactic]] or [[Trick]] event, exhaust Chuck Fergus: Choose one -
- That event gains fast.
- That event costs 2 fewer resources to play.
- You get +2 skill value while performing a skill test during the resolution of that event.
Name: Chuck Fergus

Description:
Limit 1 per investigator.
While attacking, parleying, or attempting to evade an exhausted enemy, you get +2 skill value.
[reaction] After you evade an enemy, exhaust Dirty Fighting: Take a fight action against that enemy. Ignore the aloof keyword for this attack.
Name: Dirty Fighting

Description: Investigate. Add your [agility] value to your skill value for this investigation. If you succeed by 1 or more, you may automatically evade an enemy at this location. If you succeed by 3 or more, return Breaking and Entering to your hand at the end of your turn. This action does not provoke attacks of opportunity.
Name: Breaking and Entering

Description: Uses (6 supplies). [action] Spend 1 supply: Investigate. For this investigation, you may use [agility] instead of [intellect], and you get +1 skill value. If you succeed, gain 1 resource (2 resources instead if you succeed by 2 or more).
Name: Thieves' Kit

Description: [reaction] After Trigger Man enters play: Attach an [[Illicit]] asset from your hand to Trigger Man (it is considered to be in play and under your control). [fast] Exhaust Trigger Man and spend 1 resource: Resolve an [action] ability on attached asset, without paying its [action] cost. Resolve that ability with a base skill value of 4.
Name: Trigger Man

Description:
Permanent. Exceptional. You get +10 deck size.
[reaction] Before drawing your opening hand, choose 10 [[Illicit]] cards from your deck: Shuffle them together and place them next to Underworld Market, as your market deck.
[reaction] At the start of your turn: Reveal the top 2 cards of your market deck. You may spend 1 resource to draw 1 of them. Place the rest on the bottom, in any order.
Name: Underworld Market

Description:
Fast. Play only during your turn.
For each exhausted non-swarm enemy at your location, choose a different option:
- Gain 2 resources.
- Deal 2 damage to that enemy.
- Discover 1 clue at your location.
- Draw 1 card.
Name: Clean Sneak

Description:
Customizable. When you purchase Living Ink, choose a skill and circle it on its upgrade sheet.
Uses (3 charges).
Remove 1 charge from Living Ink at the start of each of your turns. If Living Ink has no charges, discard it.
You get +1 to the chosen skill(s).
Name: Living Ink

Description:
Customizable. As an additional cost to play Summoned Servitor, you must discard another asset you control.
Summoned Servitor enters play at your location. It can take 1 action during each of your turns, which can only be used to take the following action:
- Move Summoned Servitor to a connecting revealed location.
Name: Summoned Servitor

Description: Customizable. Fast. Play only during your turn. Attach to a non-[[Elite]] enemy at your location. [action] If attached enemy is at your location: Parley. Give it a command (limit once per round per command) - - "Go." This enemy moves once in a direction of your choice. - "Cower." This enemy exhausts.
Name: Power Word

Description: [action]: Fight. Either use your [willpower] or get +1 [combat] for this attack. When you initiate this ability, choose one - - Exhaust Ceremonial Sickle and place 1 doom on it to get +1 skill value and deal +1 damage for this attack. - If this attack defeats an enemy, remove 1 doom from Ceremonial Sickle.
Name: Ceremonial Sickle

Description: [action]: Investigate. Either use your [willpower] or get +1 [intellect] for this investigation. When you initiate this ability, choose one - - Exhaust Dowsing Rod and place 1 doom on it to move to a connecting location. - If this investigation discovers the last clue at a location, remove 1 doom from Dowsing Rod.
Name: Dowsing Rod

Description:
[action]: Choose an investigator at your location and either (choose one) -
- Exhaust Hallowed Chalice and place 1 doom on it to heal 2 damage or 2 horror from that investigator.
- Heal 1 damage or 1 horror from that investigator. If you heal the last damage or horror from that investigator, remove 1 doom from Hallowed Chalice.
Name: Hallowed Chalice

Description: [action]: Evade. Either use your [willpower] or get +1 [agility] for this evasion attempt. When you initiate this ability, choose one - - Exhaust Onyx Pentacle and place 1 doom on it to target any enemy at your location or a connecting location, and get +1 skill value for this evasion attempt. - If you succeed by 2 or more, remove 1 doom from Onyx Pentacle.
Name: Onyx Pentacle

Description: For each arcane slot you have, draw 1 card (max 5). For each filled arcane slot you have, choose and discard 1 card from your hand.
Name: Eldritch Initiation

Description:
Before you play Explosive Ward, you may discard any number of cards from your arcane slots.
Deal X damage to a non-[[Elite]] enemy engaged with you. X cannot be greater than the number of empty arcane slots you have. This action does not provoke attacks of opportunity.
Name: Explosive Ward

Description: Parley. Choose a non-[[Elite]] enemy at your location and either (choose one): - Automatically evade that enemy and place 1 doom on it. It cannot take damage for the remainder of the round. Discover 1 clue at your location. - If that enemy has 1 or more doom on it, defeat it. Gain 1 resource for each doom that was on it.
Name: String of Curses

Description:
You get +1 arcane slot for each enemy beneath Binder's Jar.
[reaction] After a non-[[Elite]] enemy is defeated at your location: Place that enemy facedown beneath Binder's Jar (limit 2 enemies beneath it).
[reaction] When an enemy attacks you, discard an enemy beneath Binder's Jar that shares a [[Trait]] with the attacking enemy: Cancel that attack.
Name: Binder's Jar

Description:
After you commit Ghastly Possession to a skill test on an asset, choose one:
- Place 1 doom on that asset. Ghastly Possession gains [wild][wild].
- If this test is successful, either remove 1 doom from this asset, or replenish half of its uses (rounded down).
Name: Ghastly Possession

Description:
For each of your arcane slots that are empty, you have one additional hand slot.
You may take an additional action during your turn, which can only be used to play an asset into one of your hand slots.
Name: Astral Mirror

Description:
You get +1 skill value while resolving a skill test on an attached asset.
1 doom on each attached asset does not count towards the agenda's doom threshold.
[fast] Exhaust Elle Rubash: Choose an asset in your play area with 1 or more doom on it. Attach it to Elle Rubash, or switch it with an attached asset. (Limit 2 attached assets).
Name: Elle Rubash

Description:
Fast. Play only during your turn.
Remove all doom from a non-[[Elite]] card at your location.
Name: Moonlight Ritual

Description:
Permanent. Exceptional.
[fast] Exhaust Sin-Eater: Move 1 doom from an asset you control to Sin-Eater. Then, either ready that asset or place 1 charge on it.
[action]: Remove all doom from Sin-Eater.
Name: Sin-Eater

Description: You may discard a [[Spell]] or [[Ritual]] asset you control. Play a [[Spell]] or [[Ritual]] card from your hand or discard pile, reducing its resource cost by 3.
Name: Uncage the Soul

Description: [action]: Fight. Either use your [willpower] or get +1 [combat] for this attack. When you initiate this ability, choose one - - Exhaust Ceremonial Sickle and place 1 doom on it to get +3 skill value and deal +1 damage for this attack. - If this attack defeats an enemy, ready Ceremonial Sickle and remove all doom from it.
Name: Ceremonial Sickle

Description: [action]: Investigate. Either use your [willpower] or get +1 [intellect] for this investigation. When you initiate this ability, choose one - - Exhaust Dowsing Rod and place 1 doom on it to move to a connecting location and get +2 skill value for this investigation. - If this investigation discovers the last clue at a location, ready Dowsing Rod and remove all doom from it.
Name: Dowsing Rod

Description: [action]: Evade. Either use your [willpower] or get +1 [agility] for this evasion attempt. When you initiate this ability, choose one - - Exhaust Onyx Pentacle and place 1 doom on it to target any enemy at your location or a connecting location, and get +3 skill value for this evasion attempt. - If you succeed by 2 or more, ready Onyx Pentacle and remove all doom from it.
Name: Onyx Pentacle

Description:
Customizable. Limit 1 per investigator.
[fast] During a skill test you are performing, exhaust Pocket Multi Tool: You get +1 skill value for this test.
Name: Pocket Multi Tool

Description: Customizable. Uses (2 time). If Makeshift Trap has no time, discard it. Attach to your location. Each non-[[Elite]] enemy at attached location get -1 fight and -1 evade. Forced - At the end of the round: Remove 1 time from Makeshift Trap.
Name: Makeshift Trap

Description: Customizable. When you purchase Grizzled, choose and record two [[Traits]] on its upgrade sheet. If this is a skill test on or against an encounter card (including fighting, evading, or parleying), Grizzled gains [wild][wild] for each of the chosen traits that encounter card possesses.
Name: Grizzled

Description: [reaction] When you are dealt damage and/or horror, exhaust Idol of Xanatos and discard up to 3 cards from your hand: Cancel that much damage/horror.
Name: Idol of Xanatos

Description: Improvised Shield can only be played from your discard pile. Forced - When Improvised Shield is defeated: Shuffle it into your deck instead of discarding it.
Name: Improvised Shield

Description:
Fast. Play during your turn only if the final agenda is in play.
Draw 1 card, gain 1 resource, and gain 1 additional action. Remove End of the Road from the game.
Name: End of the Road

Description:
Fast. Play before revealing a chaos token during an attack or evasion attempt you are performing, and only if the difficulty of this test is currently 0.
This test automatically succeeds. Instead of this test's normal effects, discard the attacked or evaded enemy (if it is [[Elite]], automatically evade it and deal it 3 damage instead).
Name: Exploit Weakness

Description: Max 2 [[Dilemma]] per round. Revelation - Choose two skills ([willpower], [intellect], [combat], or [agility]). Until the end of the investigation phase, each investigator gets +1 to each of the chosen skills, and -1 to each other skill.
Name: Making Preparations

Description: Max 2 [[Dilemma]] per round. Revelation - If there are no enemies in play, draw 1 card. Otherwise, you must decide (choose one): - Each unengaged enemy moves once toward the nearest investigator. - Each investigator disengages from each enemy engaged with them and moves once away from the nearest enemy.
Name: Predator or Prey

Description:
Fast. Play before revealing a chaos token during an investigation you are performing, and only if the difficulty of this test is currently 0.
This test automatically succeeds. You discover 1 additional clue at this location and 1 additional clue at any location.
Name: Shed a Light

Description: Max 2 [[Dilemma]] per round. Revelation - Choose an investigator and decide (choose one): - The chosen investigator must immediately take an action as if it were their turn, then discards 1 card at random from their hand. - The chosen investigator loses 1 action during their next turn, then draws 3 cards.
Name: At a Crossroads

Description:
Max 1 per turn.
Fast. Play when an investigator's turn would end.
That investigator may take X additional actions during their turn. X is the number of skill tests they failed during their turn. Exile Lifeline.
Name: Lifeline

Description: Max 2 [[Dilemma]] per round. Revelation - Reveal the top 3 cards of the encounter deck. Choose an investigator to draw 1 of the revealed cards and discard the rest. Then, choose an investigator to discover 1 clue at any revealed location.
Name: Nature of the Beast

Description:
Max 1 committed per skill test.
You may commit Gumption to any type of skill test.
While Gumption is committed to a skill test, that test gets -2 difficulty.
Name: Gumption

Description: [action]: Fight. You get +2 [combat] for this attack. This attack deals +1 damage. If a [skull] or [auto_fail] symbol is revealed during this attack, either (choose one): - Return Baseball Bat to your hand after this attack. - This attack deals an additional +1 damage. Discard Baseball Bat after this attack.
Name: Baseball Bat

Description:
[reaction] When you draw a non-weakness card from the top of your deck, before resolving any of its effects, exhaust Katja Eastbank: Place that card facedown beneath her (limit 5 cards beneath her). Draw a new card to replace it.
[action]: Draw any card beneath Katja Eastbank.
Name: Katja Eastbank

Description: Max 2 [[Dilemma]] per round. Revelation - Reveal the top card from each investigator's deck and place them in a pile. Repeat this two more times. Choose one of the three piles. Each investigator draws each of their cards from that pile. Shuffle each weakness in each other pile into its owner's deck. Remove each other revealed card from the game.
Name: Heed the Dream

Description: Choose an [[Item]] asset in your discard pile. Either (choose one): - Remove that asset from the game and gain resources equal to its cost. - Play that asset (paying its cost).
Name: Salvage

Description: Uses (3 keys). If there are no keys on Old Keyring, discard it. [action]: Investigate. Your location gets -2 shroud for this investigation. If you succeed, remove 1 key from Old Keyring, and if this test's difficulty is 0, you discover 1 additional clue.
Name: Old Keyring

Description: Max 2 [[Dilemma]] per round. Revelation - You must decide (choose one): - Place 1 doom on the current agenda. Each investigator heals 3 damage and 3 horror. - Remove 1 doom from the current agenda. Each investigator takes 1 direct damage and 1 direct horror. Remove Fickle Fortune from the game.
Name: Fickle Fortune

Description: Customizable. Uses (4 aether). If Hyperphysical Shotcaster has no aether, discard it. [action] Spend 1 aether: Resolve the Manifest ability of the Hyperphysical Shotcaster's current form. [fast] Exhaust Hyperphysical Shotcaster: Change its form (to one you have unlocked on its upgrade sheet).
Name: Hyperphysical Shotcaster

Description:
Each attached asset takes up no slots and its text box is treated as if it were blank (except for [[Traits]]).
[fast] Exhaust Tool Belt: Choose one - attach a [[Tool]] asset in your play area to Tool Belt, switch a [[Tool]] asset in your play area with an attached asset, or detach an attached asset.
Name: Tool Belt

Description:
As an additional cost to play Refine, spend an action.
Immediately mark a checkbox on an upgrade sheet for a customizable card you own, even if it is not in play.
Max once per game for each investigator.
Name: Refine

Description: Uses (4 supplies). [reaction] When you perform a skill test while investigating or attempting to evade, spend 1 supply: This test gets -2 difficulty. Card design by the Council-in-Exile at Arkham Nights 2020.
Name: Flashlight

Description:
Permanent. Exceptional.
For every point of damage and/or horror you heal in excess of an investigator's current damage/horror, place 1 resource on Soul Sanctification, as an offering. This still counts as healing.
[fast] Spend 1 offering: You get +2 skill value for this test. (Limit twice per test.)
Name: Soul Sanctification

Description: [guardian] investigator only. Hunter. Spawn - Any connecting location. Lurker in the Dark can only be attacked or damaged using [[Weapon]] assets or [[Tactic]] events, and takes 1 fewer damage from each source.
Name: Lurker in the Dark

Description: [seeker] investigator only. As an additional cost to play Quantum Paradox, you must choose and discard 4 other cards from your hand. Forced - If Quantum Paradox is in your hand at the end of your turn: Reveal it and take 1 horror.
Name: Quantum Paradox

Description: [rogue] investigator only. As an additional cost to play Pay Your Due, you may spend any number of additional actions. Reduce its cost by 5 for each additional action spent. Forced - If Pay Your Due is in your hand at the end of your turn: Reveal it and take 1 damage.
Name: Pay Your Due

Description:
[mystic] investigator only.
Hunter.
The first time you reveal a chaos token while attacking or attempting to evade Ectoplasmic Horror, reveal an additional token for each empty arcane slot you have.
Name: Ectoplasmic Horror

Description:
[survivor] investigator only.
Play only if Underprepared is the only card in your hand and you have exactly 1 resource in your resource pool.
While Underprepared is in your hand, each card you commit to skill tests is considered to have 1 fewer matching skill icon.
Name: Underprepared

Description:
[free] Spend 1 resource: You get +1 [willpower] for this skill test.
[free] Spend 1 resource: You get +1 [combat] for this skill test.
Name: Physical Training

Description: Choose either your location or a connecting location. Deal 3 damage to each enemy and to each investigator at the chosen location. This action does not provoke attacks of opportunity.
Name: Dynamite Blast

Description:
[free] Spend 1 resource: You get +1 [intellect] for this skill test.
[free] Spend 1 resource: You get +1 [agility] for this skill test.
Name: Hyperawareness

Description: Attach to your location. Non-[[Elite]] enemies cannot move into or spawn at attached location. Each time a non-[[Elite]] enemy would spawn at attached location, spawn it at a connecting location instead, if able. Forced - When an investigator leaves attached location: Discard Barricade.
Name: Barricade

Description:
[free] Spend 1 resource: You get +1 [combat] for this skill test.
[free] Spend 1 resource: You get +1 [agility] for this skill test.
Name: Hard Knocks

Description: Gain 10 resources.
Name: Hot Streak

Description:
[free] Spend 1 resource: You get +1 [willpower] for this skill test.
[free] Spend 1 resource: You get +1 [intellect] for this skill test.
Name: Arcane Studies

Description:
Fast. Play after a phase begins.
Choose a non-[[Elite]] enemy in your location. Until the end of the phase, reduce the chosen enemy's damage and horror values by 1, and treat its printed text box as if it were blank (except for [[Traits]]).
Name: Mind Wipe

Description:
[free] Spend 1 resource: You get +1 [willpower] for this skill test.
[free] Spend 1 resource: You get +1 [agility] for this skill test.
Name: Dig Deep

Description: [reaction] After you fail a skill test, exhaust Rabbit's Foot: Search the top X cards of your deck for a card, draw it, and shuffle the remaining cards into your deck. X is the amount you failed by.
Name: Rabbit's Foot

Description:
You have two additional hand slots, which can only be used to hold [[Weapon]] assets.
While you have [[Weapon]] assets held in 2 or more hand slots, you get +1 [willpower].
Name: Bandolier

Description: [action]: Fight. You get +2 [combat] for this attack. If you perform this attack against an enemy engaged with another investigator, you deal +1 damage for this attack if you succeed, and no damage if you fail.
Name: Blackjack

Description:
Play only if there is a clue on your location.
Draw 3 cards.
Name: Preposterous Sketches

Description:
Researched. Uses (3 supplies).
[action] Spend 1 supply and exhaust Strange Solution: Choose an investigator at your location to gain 2 resources and draw 1 card.
Name: Strange Solution

Description:
Choose an asset controlled by an investigator at your location. Either (choose one):
- Place 2 ammo or supply tokens on that asset and draw 1 card.
- Double the number of ammo or supply tokens on that asset.
Name: Contraband

Description:
Fast. Play when an enemy enters your location.
Immediately move to a connecting location. (The enemy still enters your previous location.)
Name: Think on Your Feet

Description: Uses (3 charges). [action] Spend 1 charge: Investigate. Investigate using [willpower] instead of [intellect]. You get +2 [willpower] for this test. If you succeed you discover 1 additional clue at this location. If a [skull], [cultist], [tablet], [elder_thing], or [auto_fail] symbol is revealed during this test, after this test resolves lose all remaining actions and immediately end your turn.
Name: Rite of Seeking

Description:
Uses (4 charges).
[action] Spend 1 charge: Heal 2 horror from among investigators at your location.
Name: Clarity of Mind

Description:
Fast. Play after you fail a skill test by 3 or less while attacking an enemy.
Deal this attack's damage to any enemy at your location. If the attacked enemy is engaged with another investigator, this attack deals no damage to that investigator.
Name: Oops!

Description:
Commit only to a skill test you are performing, and only if the difficulty of that test is higher than your base skill value.
Rise to the Occasion gets +X [wild] icons, where X is the difference between your base skill and this test's difficulty (to a maximum of +3 [wild] icons).
Name: Rise to the Occasion

Description: Revelation - Draw the top card of your deck. If it is not a weakness, remove that card from the game. Then, search your deck, discard pile, hand, and all play areas for each other copy of that card you own, and remove them from the game, as well.
Name: Through the Gates

Description: Uses (6 ammo). [action] Spend 1 ammo: Fight. You deal +1 damage for this attack. [free] Spend 1 resource: Return .32 Colt to your hand.
Name: .32 Colt

Description: Fast. Play when you activate the Fight ability on a [[Firearm]] asset. Spend 1 additional ammo token from that asset. When you reveal chaos tokens for this attack, reveal 1 additional chaos token. Choose one to resolve and ignore the other.
Name: "Eat lead!"

Description: For each clue you have (to a maximum of 3), either heal 2 horror from an investigator at your location or discard a [[Terror]] card at your location.
Name: Logical Reasoning

Description: Researched. Uses (3 charges). [action] Spend 1 charge: Investigate. If you succeed, you may put an asset with printed cost of X or lower into play from your hand. X is the amount you succeeded by.
Name: Archaic Glyphs

Description: [free] During your turn, exhaust Stealth: Evade. The chosen enemy gets -2 evade for this evasion attempt. If you successfully evade the enemy, disengage with it but do not exhaust it. Until the end of your turn, that enemy cannot engage you.
Name: Stealth

Description: Uses (3 charges). If Suggestion has no charges, discard it. [action] Exhaust Suggestion: Evade. Add your [willpower] value to your skill value for this evasion attempt. If you do not succeed by at least 2, remove 1 charge from Suggestion.
Name: Suggestion

Description:
Uses (4 charges).
[action] Exhaust Alchemical Transmutation, spend 1 charge: Test [willpower] (0). For each point you succeed by, gain 1 resource (to a maximum of 4). If a [skull], [cultist], [tablet], [elder_thing], or [auto_fail] symbol is revealed during this test, take 1 damage.
Name: Alchemical Transmutation

Description: Fight. This attack uses [willpower] instead of [combat]. You get +2 [willpower] for this attack. If you succeed, instead of its standard damage, this attack deals 3 damage to each enemy at the attacked enemy's location (any additional damage is dealt to the attacked enemy). If a [skull], [cultist], [tablet], [elder_thing], or [auto_fail] token is revealed during this attack, deal 2 damage to each investigator at the attacked enemy's location.
Name: Storm of Spirits

Description: [action]: Investigate. Your location gets -1 shroud for this investigation. [action] Discard Lantern: Deal 1 damage to an enemy at your location (or remove Lantern from the game to deal 2 damage, instead). This action does not provoke attacks of opportunity.
Name: Lantern

Description: [action]: Fight. You get +2 [combat] for this attack. [action] Discard Gravedigger's Shovel: Discover 1 clue at your location (or remove Gravedigger's Shovel from the game to discover 2 clues, instead).
Name: Gravedigger's Shovel

Description: Campaign Mode only. Peril. Hidden. Revelation - Secretly add this card to your hand. Forced - When the game ends or you are eliminated, if this card is in your hand: You earn 2 fewer experience. [reaction] When you deal damage to an enemy in excess of its remaining health: Discard this card from your hand.
Name: Unspeakable Oath

Description: Campaign Mode only. Peril. Hidden. Revelation - Secretly add this card to your hand. Forced - When the game ends or you are eliminated, if this card is in your hand: You earn 2 fewer experience. [reaction] After you successfully investigate a location with no clues on it: Discard this card from your hand.

Description: Uses (4 charges). [action] Spend 1 charge: Fight. This attack uses [willpower] instead of [combat] and deals +1 damage. If an [elder_sign], "+1," or "0" token is revealed during this attack, take 1 damage.
Name: Azure Flame

Description: Uses (3 charges). [action] Spend 1 charge: Investigate. Investigate using [willpower] instead of [intellect]. If you succeed, discover 1 additional clue at this location. If an [elder_sign], "+1," or "0" token is revealed during this investigation, take 1 horror.
Name: Clairvoyance

Description: Uses (3 charges). [action] Spend 1 charge: Evade. This evasion attempt uses [willpower] instead of [agility]. If you succeed, deal 1 damage to the evaded enemy. If an [elder_sign], "+1," or "0" token is revealed during this evasion attempt, lose 1 resource.
Name: Ineffable Truth

Description: You have 1 additional arcane slot, which can only be used to hold a [[Spell]] asset.
Name: Familiar Spirit

Description:
You get +1 [willpower].
[reaction] After a skill test at your location begins, exhaust Crystal Pendulum: Name a number. If this test succeeds by that number or fails by that number, draw 1 card.
Name: Crystal Pendulum

Description: [reaction] When you play a [[Spell]] card, exhaust Robes of Endless Night: Reduce the cost of that card by 1.
Name: Robes of Endless Night

Description: Move. Move to any revealed location and reveal a random token from the chaos bag. If you reveal a [skull], [cultist], [tablet], [elder_thing], or [auto_fail] symbol, you must discard an [[Item]] or [[Ally]] asset you control (if you cannot, take 1 damage).
Name: Astral Travel

Description:
Fast. Play when an enemy attacks an investigator at your location.
Cancel that attack. Then, reveal a random token from the chaos bag. If it has a [skull], [cultist], [tablet], [elder_thing], or [auto_fail] symbol, deal the attacking enemy's damage to itself.
Name: Hypnotic Gaze

Description: Look at the top 4 cards of the encounter deck. Reveal a random token from the chaos bag. If it has a [skull], [cultist], [tablet], [elder_thing], or [auto_fail] symbol, shuffle those cards into the encounter deck. Otherwise, return them to the top of the encounter deck in any order.
Name: Parallel Fates

Description: Gain 1 resource. Reveal 3 random tokens from the chaos bag. For each [skull], [cultist], [tablet], [elder_thing], or [auto_fail] symbol revealed, gain an additional 2 resources.
Name: Voice of Ra

Description:
Fast. Play when you would reveal a chaos token.
Reveal 5 chaos tokens instead of 1. Choose one of those tokens with a [skull], [cultist], [tablet], [elder_thing], or [auto_fail] symbol to resolve, and ignore the rest. (If no such token is revealed, choose any one of those tokens to resolve, and ignore the rest.)
Name: Dark Prophecy

Description: Before revealing chaos tokens for this test, choose one of the following symbols: ([skull], [cultist], [tablet], or [elder_thing]). Ignore the effects of the chosen symbol during this test (including its modifier).
Name: Defiance

Description:
Max 1 committed per skill test.
After you commit Prescient to a skill test, name "even," "odd," or "symbol." After this test ends, if a chaos token of the named type was revealed during this test, you may return a [[Spell]] card from your discard pile to your hand.
Name: Prescient

Description:
Fast. Play when you would resolve an effect on a [mystic] card that triggers "when," "if," or "after" a chaos token is revealed.
Either cancel that effect, or resolve it an additional time.
Name: Eldritch Inspiration

Description:
Uses (3 charges). If Grotesque Statue has no charges, discard it.
[reaction] When you would reveal a chaos token, spend 1 charge: Reveal 2 chaos tokens instead of 1. Choose one of those tokens to resolve, and ignore the other.
Name: Grotesque Statue

Description: [reaction] When you play a [[Spell]] card, exhaust Robes of Endless Night: Reduce the cost of that card by 1. Playing that card does not provoke attacks of opportunity.
Name: Robes of Endless Night

Description:
Fast. Play when an enemy attacks an investigator at your location.
Cancel that attack. Then, reveal a random token from the chaos bag. If it has a [skull], [cultist], [tablet], [elder_thing], or [auto_fail] symbol, deal damage to the attacking enemy equal to its damage or horror.
Name: Hypnotic Gaze

Description:
Max 1 committed per skill test.
If this test is successful, draw 1 card (2 cards instead if it succeeds by 2 or more).
Name: Guts

Description: Uses (4 charges). [action] Spend 1 charge: Fight. This attack uses [willpower] instead of [combat]. You get +2 [willpower] and deal +1 damage for this attack. If an [elder_sign], "+1," or "0" token is revealed during this attack, take 1 damage.
Name: Azure Flame

Description: Uses (3 charges). [action] Spend 1 charge: Investigate. Investigate using [willpower] instead of [intellect]. You get +2 [willpower] for this investigation. If you succeed, discover 1 additional clue at this location. If an [elder_sign], "+1," or "0" token is revealed during this investigation, take 1 horror.
Name: Clairvoyance

Description: Uses (3 charges). [action] Spend 1 charge: Evade. This evasion attempt uses [willpower] instead of [agility]. You get +2 [willpower] for this evasion attempt. If you succeed, deal 1 damage to the evaded enemy. If an [elder_sign], "+1," or "0" token is revealed during this evasion attempt, lose 1 resource.
Name: Ineffable Truth

Description:
Uses (2 resources). Replenish these resources at the start of each round.
[fast] Spend 1 resource from your resource pool or from Arcane Studies: You get +1 [willpower] or +1 [intellect] for this skill test.
Name: Arcane Studies

Description: Choose a [[Spell]] or [[Relic]] asset controlled by an investigator at your location and reveal a random chaos token from the chaos bag. If you reveal a [skull], [cultist], [tablet], [elder_thing], or [auto_fail] symbol, add 1 charge to the chosen asset. Otherwise, add 4 charges to the chosen asset.
Name: Recharge

Description: Uses (4 charges). [action] Spend 1 charge: Fight. This attack uses [willpower] instead of [combat]. You get +3 [willpower] and deal +2 damage for this attack. If an [elder_sign], "+1," or "0" token is revealed during this attack, take 2 damage.
Name: Azure Flame

Description: Uses (3 charges). [action] Spend 1 charge: Investigate. Investigate using [willpower] instead of [intellect]. You get +3 [willpower] for this investigation. If you succeed, discover 2 additional clues at this location. If an [elder_sign], "+1," or "0" token is revealed during this investigation, take 2 horror.
Name: Clairvoyance

Description: Uses (3 charges). [action] Spend 1 charge: Evade. This evasion attempt uses [willpower] instead of [agility]. You get +3 [willpower] for this evasion attempt. If you succeed, deal 2 damage to the evaded enemy. If an [elder_sign], "+1," or "0" token is revealed during this evasion attempt, lose 2 resources.
Name: Ineffable Truth

Description:
[reaction] After you fail a skill test: You may take an additional action during your turn this round. (Limit once per round.)
[elder_sign] effect: +1. You may instead choose to automatically fail this skill test to heal 1 damage and 1 horror.
Name: Stella Clark

Description:
Stella Clark deck only.
If this skill test fails, cancel all effects of the failed test.
Name: Neither Rain nor Snow

Description: Revelation - Put Called by the Mists into play in your threat area. Forced - After you initiate a skill test with a difficulty of 4 or higher: Take 1 damage. [action] [action]: Discard Called by the Mists.
Name: Called by the Mists

Description: Revelation - Put Atychiphobia into play in your threat area. Forced - After you fail a skill test: Take 1 horror. [action] [action]: Discard Atychiphobia.
Name: Atychiphobia

Description: Uses (2 ammo). [action] Spend 1 ammo: Fight. You get +2 [combat] and deal +1 damage for this attack. If you fail, place 1 ammo on .18 Derringer.
Name: .18 Derringer

Description:
Uses (4 secrets).
[reaction] After an investigator at your location fails a skill test by 2 or more, exhaust Grimm's Fairy Tales and spend 1 secret: Heal 1 horror from that investigator.
Name: Grimm's Fairy Tales

Description: Uses (2 keys). If there are no keys on Old Keyring, discard it. [action]: Investigate. Your location gets -2 shroud for this investigation. If you succeed, remove 1 key from Old Keyring.
Name: Old Keyring

Description:
You get +1 [willpower].
[reaction] When an investigator at your location would fail a skill test, exhaust Granny Orne: That investigator fails by either 1 less or 1 more.
Name: Granny Orne

Description: [fast] Discard Mysterious Raven and take 1 horror: Discover 1 clue at your location.
Name: Mysterious Raven

Description: [reaction] After you fail a skill test, exhaust Rabbit's Foot: Draw 1 card.
Name: Rabbit's Foot

Description:
[free] Spend 1 resource: You get +1 [combat] for this skill test.
[free] Spend 1 resource: You get +1 [agility] for this skill test.
Name: Scrapper

Description:
Fast. Play only during your turn.
Do not reveal chaos tokens for the next skill test you perform this turn.
Name: Will to Survive

Description:
Fast. Play when an investigator at your location draws a non-weakness treachery card.
Test [willpower] (3). If you succeed, cancel that card's revelation effect.
Name: A Test of Will

Description:
Fast. Play after you fail a skill test by 2 or less during an evasion attempt against a non-[[Elite]] enemy.
Place that enemy on top of the encounter deck.
Name: Dumb Luck

Description:
Fast. Play after you fail a skill test.
You get +1 to each of your skills for the remainder of the round.
Name: Grit Your Teeth

Description: Fast. Play after a skill test you failed ends (after resolving all effects from the failed test). Attempt that test again. You get +2 skill value for this test.
Name: Live and Learn

Description:
Fast. Play after you fail a skill test by 2 or less while investigating.
Discover 2 clues in your location.
Name: "Look what I found!"

Description:
Fast. Play after you fail a skill test by 2 or less while attacking an enemy engaged with you.
Deal this attack's damage to a different enemy at your location.
Name: Oops!

Description:
Max 1 committed per skill test.
You may commit Take Heart to any type of test.
If this test fails, the performing investigator draws 2 cards and gains 2 resources.
Name: Take Heart

Description: Forced - When Cherished Keepsake is defeated by horror: Exile it.
Name: Cherished Keepsake

Description: Forced - When Leather Coat is defeated by damage: Exile it.
Name: Leather Coat

Description: Uses (3 ammo). [action] Spend 1 ammo: Fight. You get +2 [combat] and deal +1 damage for this attack. If you fail, place 1 ammo on .18 Derringer and the next time you trigger this ability this round, you get an additional +1 [combat] for that attack.
Name: .18 Derringer

Description:
Fast. Play when an investigator at your location draws a non-weakness treachery card.
Cancel that card's revelation effect. Then, test [willpower] (3). If you fail, exile A Test of Will.
Name: A Test of Will

Description:
Fast. Play after you fail a skill test by 3 or less while investigating.
Discover 2 total clues from among your location and connecting locations.
Name: "Look what I found!"

Description:
Fast. Play after you fail a skill test by 3 or less during an evasion attempt against a non-[[Elite]] enemy.
Place that enemy on the bottom of the encounter deck.
Name: Dumb Luck

Description:
Max 1 committed per skill test.
If this test fails, return Unexpected Courage to your hand.
Name: Unexpected Courage

Description:
You get +1 [willpower] and +1 [intellect].
[reaction] When an investigator at your location would fail a skill test, exhaust Granny Orne: That investigator either gets +1 skill value or -1 skill value for that test.
Name: Granny Orne

Description:
Fast. Play when an investigator at your location would fail a skill test.
They get +3 to their skill value for that test. That investigator draws 1 card.
Name: Lucky!

Description: Uses (3 supplies). [action] Spend 1 supply: Fight. You get +2 [combat] and deal +2 damage for this attack. If this attack fails, either place 1 supply on Chainsaw or deal 1 damage to the attacked enemy.
Name: Chainsaw

Description:
Permanent.
During or before your first action of each of your turns, each skill test you perform gets +1 difficulty.
During or after your third action of each of your turns, each skill test you performed gets -1 difficulty.
Name: Quick Learner

Description:
Permanent.
In between two scenarios of a campaign, reduce the experience cost to repurchase up to 3 cards that you exiled during the last scenario by 1 each.
Name: Dj Vu

Description: Put each of the remaining set-aside locations into play, revealed location side faceup - The Great Abyss, Tunnels under Ngranek, Stairway to Sarkomand, and Mist-Filled Caverns. (Place clues on each of those locations equal to their clue value.) The investigator resolving this text disengages from each engaged enemy and moves to The Great Abyss. Flip this card back over. For the remainder of the game, it cannot be flipped over again.
Name: To the Dreamlands

Description:
You must decide (choose one):
- Remove 2 strength from the abyss.
- Add 2 strength to the abyss.
Regardless of your choice, flip this card back over. For the remainder of the game, it cannot be flipped over again.
Name: Fate of the Dreamers

Description:
You must decide (choose one):
- Test [agility] (4) to free the creatures. If you succeed, one of them hands you 3 black whistles before they fly off toward their master; take control of the set-aside Summoned Nightgaunt asset and remember that you "freed the nightgaunts."
- Test [combat] (4) to slay the creatures. If you succeed, remember that you "executed the nightgaunts."
Regardless of your choice and whether you succeed or fail the indicated skill test, flip this card back over.
Name: Prisoners of Conquest

Description:
You must decide (choose one):
- Test [intellect] (3) to speak to the almost-humanoid creatures that dwell in these ruins. If you succeed, you warn them of the battle below and they flee; remember that you "warned the denizens of Sarkomand."
- Test [combat] (3) to block the trapdoor. If you succeed, you topple the lion statues and use them to block the entrance to the stairway as you descend back into the depths; remember that you "cut off all escape."
Regardless of your choice and whether you succeed or fail the indicated skill test, flip this card back over.
Name: Ruins of Sarkomand

Description:
You must decide (choose one):
- Test [willpower] (2) to entreat the entity depicted in this statue for aid. If you succeed, remember that you "pled for help."
- Test [combat] (2) to overthrow the statue. If you succeed, it topples over and shatters into pieces on the jagged cavern floor; remember that you "affronted the ruler of this realm."
Regardless of your choice and whether you succeed or fail the indicated skill test, flip this card back over.
Name: Effigy of Nodens

Description: If each of the following requirements are met, you may proceed to (R3). - The strength of the abyss must be 5 or higher. - The investigators must have "executed the nightgaunts," "cut off all escape," and "affronted the ruler of this realm." If the above requirements are not met, each investigator may choose whether or not to accept Xzharah's mercy and immediately resign. If any investigators remain, flip this card back to its enemy side.
Name: Usurp the Night

Description:
After an investigator has "discovered an ancient tablet," read the following (if this task has already been completed, read the following immediately):
You bring the tablet to Dr. El Masri, and she translates it to the best of her ability. "When the Choice is made, He shall be empowered by a thousand sacrifices from the sacred land." She blinks a few times, trying to process what it means. "How many coma patients are there right now?" she asks, wide-eyed.
Remove 1 strength from the abyss. (Group limit once per game.)
Name: The Translator's Evidence

Description:
After an investigator has "sabotaged the train," read the following (if this task has already been completed, read the following immediately):
You manage to corner Dr. Moore as he tries to escape the city on foot. "Very clever," he admits. "But you're already out of time. Lock me up, it doesn't matter. The dreamers will be sacrificed, and our Chosen will lead us to a new age." But after several hours, he is begging to be let out of the city. "Please, the reaper is coming! Neith is coming for us all. We'll all be sacrificed, don't you understand? You and me both! All of us need to flee the city while we still can!"
Remove 1 strength from the abyss. (Group limit once per game.)
Name: The Supplicant's Evidence

Description:
After an investigator has "found a door marked with blood," read the following (if this task has already been completed, read the following immediately):
Using the key Nadia gave you, you enter the marked residence. To your surprise, there is nobody inside - only the faint stench of rot and aged leather. The basement of the residence is littered with old books, records kept by the Brotherhood and its many agents. They will take some time to peruse, but a lead is a lead.
Remove 1 strength from the abyss. (Group limit once per game.)
Name: The Priestess's Evidence

Description:
After an investigator has "broken into a deserted temple," read the following (if this task has already been completed, read the following immediately):
Farid grins wide as he scoops golden idols into his rucksack. You press him for information before he gets too excited. "Look, they promised me wealth beyond my wildest dreams. Even I have my price, you know?" He throws up his hands, resigned. "Let me show you my records. I've done a lot of 'business' in the last few months. That'll point you in the right direction."
Remove 1 strength from the abyss. (Group limit once per game.)
Name: The Salesman's Evidence

Description: Remove 1 strength from the abyss. (Group limit once per game.)
Name: The Assassin's Evidence

Description:
After an investigator has "bought an odd trinket," read the following (if this task has already been completed, read the following immediately):
You set the trinket down on the professor's desk. He puts on his monocle and examines it carefully. "Intriguing!" he exclaims. "This could only have come from a particular tomb in the royal crypts. Most scholars don't believe it exists." He rises to his feet and shakes your hand. "Give me some time to study this further. Perhaps if we both make it out of this alive, I can resubmit my thesis," he says with a morbid chuckle.
Remove 1 strength from the abyss. (Group limit once per game.)
Name: The Professor's Evidence

Description:
You get +1 [willpower] and +1 sanity for each [[Tome]] asset you control.
[fast]: One at a time, resolve an [action] ability on each [[Tome]] asset you control, ignoring their [action] cost. (Limit once per game.)
[elder_sign] effect: +1. You may return a [[Tome]] asset from your discard pile to your hand.
Name: Daisy Walker

Description:
Daisy Walker deck only. Advanced.
You have 2 additional hand slots, which can only be used to hold [[Tome]] assets.
[reaction] When you play a [[Tome]] asset during your turn, exhaust Daisy's Tote Bag: That asset gains fast.
Name: Daisy's Tote Bag

Description: Advanced. Revelation - Put this card into play in your threat area, with 3 horror on it. It cannot leave play while it has 1 or more horror on it. While it is in play, treat each [elder_sign] you reveal on a chaos token as a [cultist], [tablet], and [elder_thing] (resolve all three). [action]: Move 1 horror from this card to Daisy Walker. Then, if The Necronomicon has no horror on it, discard it.
Name: The Necronomicon

Description:
[fast] Spend up to 3 resources: Test a base skill value of 3 against a difficulty equal to the amount of resources just spent. If you succeed, gain twice the number of spent resources. Only [agility] and [wild] skill icons may be committed to this test. (Limit once per round.)
[elder_sign] effect: +1. Choose a level 2 or less card in your discard pile. Add the chosen card to your hand.
Name: "Skids" O'Toole

Description:
"Skids" O'Toole deck only. Advanced.
Fast. Play during any [fast] window.
Until the end of the round, non-[[Elite]] enemies cannot attack you. At the end of the round, you may disengage from each engaged enemy and move up to 2 locations away.
Name: On the Lam

Description: Advanced. Revelation - Put Hospital Debts into play in your threat area. [fast]: Move 1 resource from your resource pool to Hospital Debts. (Limit three times per round.) Forced - When the game ends, if Hospital Debts has fewer than 9 resources on it: You earn 2 fewer experience for this scenario.
Name: Hospital Debts

Description:
As an additional cost to play a [[Spell]] event, you may take 1 damage. If you do, reduce the cost to play that event by 2, and you may shuffle that event back into your deck instead of discarding it.
[elder_sign] effect: +1. You may heal 1 damage.
Name: Agnes Baker

Description:
Agnes Baker deck only. Advanced.
Only damage and/or horror from player card effects can be assigned to Heirloom of Hyperborea.
[reaction] After you play a [[Spell]] card: Draw 1 card.
Name: Heirloom of Hyperborea

Description: Advanced. Place 1 doom on the current agenda. This effect may cause the current agenda to advance. Forced - If Dark Memory is in your hand at the end of your turn, reveal it and take 2 horror.
Name: Dark Memory

Description:
Agnes Baker must decide (choose one):
- Agnes Baker collects 1 memory from Elspeth Baudin.
- Agnes Baker gains 2 [per_investigator] clues from the token bank.
Then, flip this card over, exhausted and unengaged.
Name: Triumph and Subjugation

Description: At deck creation, choose 3 different Directive assets to add to your deck. [fast]: Flip a Directive asset facedown (ignoring its permanent keyword). (Limit once per game.) [elder_sign] effect: +2. Choose a Directive asset. You may ignore its regulation ability this round.
Name: Roland Banks

Description: Roland Bank deck only. Permanent. Regulation - You cannot fight more than twice each round. [fast] During a skill test while investigating, evading, or parleying, exhaust Directive: You get +2 skill value for this test for each enemy engaged with you.
Name: Directive

Description: Roland Bank deck only. Permanent. Regulation - You cannot play more than 2 cards each round. [reaction] When you play an [[Insight]] or [[Tactic]] event, exhaust this Directive: That event gains fast.
Name: Directive

Description: Roland Bank deck only. Permanent. Regulation - You cannot voluntarily assign damage or horror to [[Ally]] assets. You have 1 additional ally slot.
Name: Directive

Description: Roland Bank deck only. Permanent. Regulation - When your location has 1 or more clues, you cannot commit cards to skill tests unless you have discovered a clue this round. [reaction] After you discover a clue, if an enemy is at your location, exhaust this Directive: Draw 1 card.
Name: Directive

Description: Roland Bank deck only. Permanent. Regulation - You cannot move more than twice each round. You get +3 sanity.
Name: Directive

Description: Roland Banks deck only. Advanced. Uses (4 ammo). [action] Spend 1 ammo: Fight. You get +2 [combat] for this attack (if there are 1 or more clues on your location, you get +4 [combat], instead). This attack deals +1 damage. If this attack defeats an enemy and there are no clues on your location, place 1 ammo on Roland's .38 Special
Name: Roland's .38 Special

Description: Advanced. Revelation - Put Cover Up into play in your threat area, with 4 clues on it. [reaction] When you would discover 1 or more clues at your location: Discard that many clues from Cover Up instead. Forced - When the game ends, if there are any clues on Cover Up: You suffer 1 mental trauma.
Name: Cover Up

Description:
Add Tidal Memento to your deck.
[reaction] After you successfully evade a non-[[Elite]] enemy: Seal either 1 [bless] or [curse] token from the chaos bag, or any [bless] or [curse] tokens revealed from the chaos bag during this test, on that enemy.
[elder_sign] effect: +2. Search the chaos bag for up to 2 [bless] and/or [curse] tokens and reveal them, ignoring their effects.
Name: Wendy Adams

Description:
Wendy Adams deck only. Permanent.
[reaction] When an enemy would ready or doom would be placed on it, release a [bless] or [curse] token sealed on that enemy: Cancel that effect.
[reaction] During a skill test you are performing, when a chaos token would be revealed from the chaos bag: Resolve a [bless] or [curse] token sealed on an enemy instead.
Name: Tidal Memento

Description: Wendy Adams deck only. Advanced. You may play any event in your discard pile as if it were in your hand. Forced - After you play an event or discard an event from play: Place it on the bottom of your deck instead of in your discard pile.
Name: Wendy's Amulet

Description: Advanced. Revelation - Remove all non-weakness cards in your discard pile from the game. If no cards were removed by this effect, shuffle this card back into your deck. Otherwise, take 3 direct horror.
Name: Abandoned and Alone

Description:
You collect 1 additional resource during each upkeep phase.
[elder_sign] effect: +1 for each resource you have.
Name: Jenny Barnes

Description:
Jenny Barnes deck only. Replacement.
[free] Spend up to 3 resources and exhaust Green Man Medallion: Place those resources on it, as offerings.
[reaction] When you resign or the game ends: For every 6 offerings on Green Man Medallion, reduce the experience cost of the next card you purchase before the next scenario by 1.
Name: Green Man Medallion

Description: Jenny Barnes deck only. Replacement. Spawn - Location farthest from you. Jenny Barnes cannot gain resources via card effects.
Name: Sacrificial Beast

Description:
[reaction] After you defeat an enemy: Discover 1 clue at your location. (Limit once per round.)
[elder_sign] effect: +1 for each clue on your location.
Name: Roland Banks

Description: Roland Banks deck only. Replacement. Fast. Play only during your turn. Either place 1 clue (from the token bank) on your location, or discover 1 clue at your location. Remove Mysteries Remain from the game.
Name: Mysteries Remain

Description: Roland Banks deck only. Replacement. Revelation - Place 2 of your clues on your location. If you cannot, place all of your clues on your location, take 1 horror, and shuffle The Dirge of Reason back into your deck.
Name: The Dirge of Reason

Description: Play with the top card of your deck revealed. Once per round, you may play the top card of your deck as if it were in your hand, at -1 resource cost. Forced - After a weakness is revealed while on top of your deck: Draw it. [elder_sign] effect: +X. You may swap the top card of your deck with a card in your hand. X is the resource cost of the top card of your deck.
Name: Norman Withers

Description:
Norman Withers deck only. Replacement.
[action]: Reveal the top card of the encounter deck.
[free] Exhaust Split the Angle and discard the top card of your deck: Discard the top card of the encounter deck.
Name: Split the Angle

Description: Norman Withers deck only. Replacement. Prey - Norman Withers. While Vengeful Hounds is engaged with you, you cannot draw or reveal cards via player card effects.
Name: Vengeful Hound

Description:
[reaction] After one of your card effects heals horror from an investigator or [[Ally]] asset: The healed card's controller gains 1 resource.
[elder_sign] effect: +1. You may heal 1 horror from an investigator or [[Ally]] asset at your location.
Name: Carolyn Fern

Description:
Carolyn Fern deck only. Replacement.
Foolishness enters play with 3 horror on him. Horror on him may be healed as if it were on Carolyn Fern. While Foolishness has no horror on him, you get +1 to all skills.
Name: Foolishness

Description: Carolyn Fern deck only. Replacement. Revelation - Attach To Fight the Black Wind to the current agenda. Carolyn Fern takes 1 direct horror. Forced - At the end of the round, if any amount of horror was assigned to an investigator this round and it was not healed: Place 1 doom on attached agenda.
Name: To Fight the Black Wind

Description:
[reaction] After you reveal a chaos token during a skill test you are performing. Return a skill you committed to this test to your hand. (Limit once per round.)
[elder_sign] effect: +0. You may commit a skill from your discard pile to this test. After this test ends, return that skill to your hand instead of discarding it.
Name: Silas Marsh

Description:
Silas Marsh deck only. Replacement.
If a chaos token with a negative modifier is revealed during this test, either draw 1 card or Nautical Prowess gains [wild][wild].
Name: Nautical Prowess

Description: Silas Marsh deck only. Replacement. This skill's icons subtract from your skill value instead of adding to it. If this skill test fails, return this skill to your hand. Forced - If Dreams of the Deep is in your hand at the end of your turn: Reveal it and take 2 damage.
Name: Dreams of the Deep

Description:
[free] During your turn, discard an asset you control: Play an asset with a different title from your hand, reducing its cost by 1. (Limit once per round.)
[elder_sign] effect: +2. You may return an asset from your play area to your hand. Then, draw 1 card.
Name: Dexter Drake

Description:
Dexter Drake deck only. Replacement.
[free] Exhaust Molly Maxwell and deal her 1 horror: Name any trait. One at a time, reveal cards from the top of your deck until an asset with the named trait is revealed. Draw that asset. Shuffle each other revealed card back into your deck.
Name: Molly Maxwell

Description: Dexter Drake deck only. Replacement. Revelation - Put Yaztaroth into play in your threat area. You cannot play assets or put assests into play. [action] [action]: Discard Yaztaroth.
Name: Yaztaroth

Description:
You choose the investigator order during the mythos phase.
[reaction] When you look at 1 or more cards from the encounter deck: Look at 1 additional card and choose 1 non-[[Elite]] card among them. Either discard it, put it on top of the encounter deck, or place it facedown beneath Gloria Goldberg (max 3 cards beneath her).
[elder_sign] effect: +1. Look at the top card of the encounter deck.
Name: Gloria Goldberg

Description:
Gloria Goldberg deck only. Replacement.
[reaction] When an investigator fights, attempts to evade, or initiates a skill test on an encounter card, discard an encounter card that shares a [[Trait]] with that encounter card from beneath Gloria Goldberg: Reduce the difficulty of this skill test by 2.
Name: Ruth Westmacott

Description: Gloria Goldberg deck only. Replacement. Revelation - Draw a random non-weakness encounter card from beneath Gloria Goldberg. That card gains peril, its effects cannot be canceled, and you get -2 to all skills while resolving its effects. If that card is an enemy, it immediately attacks you. If no card is drawn by this effect, shuffle this card back into your deck.
Name: Liber Omnium Finium

Description:
While you have 1 or more doom among cards you control, you may take an additional action during your turn, which can only be used to play [[Spell]] cards or activate [[Spell]] [action] abilities.
[elder_sign] effect: +1. You may add 1 doom to or remove 1 doom from a card you control.
Name: Marie Lambeau

Description:
Marie Lambeau deck only.
Fast. Play when the agenda would advance by reaching its doom threshold.
Until the end of the phase, the agenda cannot advance by reaching its doom threshold. Remove Mystifying Song from the game.
Name: Mystifying Song

Description: Revelation - Put Baron Samedi into play. He cannot leave play while he has less than 3 doom on him. Forced - When any amount of damage is placed on an investigator in Baron Samedi's location: Place 1 additional damage on that investigator. [free] Exhaust Baron Samedi: Place 1 doom on Baron Samedi. If he has 3 or more doom on him, discard him.
Name: Baron Samedi
